Product Name: Igloo Maxcold Camping Cool Box Ice Packs Blocks
Product Description:
Igloo Maxcold Cool Box Ice Packs

Keep Your Cool On-the-Go

Introducing the Igloo Maxcold Gel Ice Pack, your ultimate cool box solution for long-lasting coolness. These reusable ice blocks are packed with non-toxic Igloo Ultratherm gel, keeping your food and drinks fresh and chilled for hours.

Here's why you'll love them:

  • Up to 20% longer lasting than traditional ice, so you can enjoy your picnic or adventure without worry.
  • Safe for food and drinks, thanks to the non-toxic gel filling in the ice block.
  • Reusable over and over again, saving you money and reducing waste.
  • Available in a range of sizes to fit your needs, from small lunchboxes to large camping coolers.
  • Simply freeze, pack, and enjoy! The Igloo Maxcold Gel Ice Pack is the perfect way to keep your food and drinks chilled in your cool box on the go.
  • Made in the USA for quality you can trust.
  • Don't settle for a lukewarm lunch or a limp picnic. Get the Igloo Maxcold Gel Ice Pack and keep your cool wherever you go!

P.S. Check out our full range of ice pack sizes to find the perfect match for your cooler!

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Cayman Outhouse Handi Drive Away Awning
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cayman Outhouse Handi Drive Away Awning

Expand your campervan or motorhome living space with the practical and versatile Cayman Outhouse Handi drive away awning. This lightweight option offers a range of benefits for campers who value practicality and convenience.

Low and Mid Sizes Available

The Outdoor Revolution Cayman Outhouse Handi drive away awning is suitable for a wide range of campervans and motorhomes.

With the Handi low being suitable for vehicle sizes ranging from 180cm-240cm this makes it ideal for mini-vans such as Volkswagen T5/T6 or Ford Transit Custom, providing extra living space for your next camping adventure.
The Handi Mid is suitable for larger vehicles ranging from 210cm-255cm, such as the Ducato/Boxer/Relay.

We recommend measuring your motorhome or vehicle to confirm suitability prior to purchase.

Key Features:

  • Unmatched Versatility: Functions as a driveaway awning or a standalone tent. Use it as a dining room, living space, storage area, or even a dedicated toilet or shower room.
  • Effortless Setup: Pitching is a breeze thanks to the simple pole-and-sleeve system that requires just 2 sturdy fiberglass poles.
  • Compact & Portable: Travel and store your awning effortlessly, the Outdoor Revolution Cayman Outhouse Handi folds down into a compact size.
  • All-Weather Protection: Zip-down storm covers shield you from rain and wind, while roof ventilation prevents condensation build-up.

Technical Specifications:

  • Weight: 6.5kg
  • Pack Size: 66 x 25 x 38cm
  • Footprint: 200 x 200cm (+80cm cowl depth)
  • Rail Connection Width: 212cm
  • Height Range: Low/Mid 2025 Version (180cm - 240cm) or Mid 2024 Version (210cm - 255cm)
Product Availability: Outdoor Revolution Cayman is sent via next working day courier

Product Description:
Garmin BC50 Wireless Reversing Camera

Manoeuvring a large vehicle or trailer can be stressful, but the Garmin BC50 Wireless Reversing Camera eliminates the guesswork. This robust camera delivers a crystal-clear view behind your vehicle thanks to 720p HD resolution and a wide 160-degree field of view. Whether you're navigating tight campsites, launching your boat, or parking your RV, the long 50-foot wireless range ensures you see everything on your compatible sat nav. Plus, the rugged weatherproof design tackles any conditions.

Universal Compatibility:

Enjoy peace of mind with the BC50's versatile compatibility. With a software update, it now works with various navigation devices, including Avtex Tourer Three, Garmin Drive Smart, and Garmin Tread. This makes it the perfect choice for drivers of all vehicle types.

Built for Tough Conditions:

The Garmin BC50 Wireless Reversing Camera is built to last. Its rugged design and IPX7 weather-resistant housing withstand rain, snow, and harsh road conditions, ensuring reliable performance year-round.

Key Features:

  • Up to 720p HD resolution for sharp visuals
  • 160-degree field of view for expansive coverage
  • Up to 50ft (15m) wireless transmission for long-range connectivity
  • 12v-24v DC power source for compatibility with most vehicles
  • Compact and rugged design for easy mounting
  • IPX7 weather-resistant for all-weather protection
  • Connects to vehicle's reverse lights (professional installation recommended)

Benefits:

Improved safety: See clearly what's behind you, reducing the risk of accidents.
Increased confidence: Manoeuvre large vehicles with ease and avoid parking stress.
Versatility: Works with a wide range of navigation devices.
Durability: Built to withstand the elements for long-lasting performance.

Technical Specifications:
  • W25 x H21.8 x D17 MM (Camera Only)
  • Weight 37.4g (Camera Only)

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Pronto Compact 3 or 4 Panel Windbreak
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Pronto Compact 3 or 4 Panel Windbreak

Tired of battling the wind on your camping trips? The Pronto Compact Windbreak offers instant privacy and protection from wind, sun and sand, making it perfect for campers, beachgoers, and outdoor enthusiasts with limited space. Available in 3 or 4 panel versions.

Effortless Quick-Erect Pop-Up System 

The innovative pop-up fiberglass pole system ensures lightning-fast setup and superior stability. Pops back down into a carry bag for simple, compact storage. 

Pronto Compact Windbreak Features

  • 120HDE all weather lightweight fabric
  • Quick pop-up system with fibreglass poles
  • Additional fibreglass poles for extra strength & stability
  • Elastic bungee peg down points
  • PVC window (3 panel model only)
  • Carry bag included

Product Name: Outwell ECOcool Lite Coolbox 24L 12V/230V - Dark Blue
Product Description:
Outwell ECOcool Lite Coolbox 24L 12V/230V - Dark Blue

Compact and practical camping cool box

The Outwell ECOcool Lite is a versatile cooler can operate on both 12v and 230v, allowing it to be used in the home or in the car, campervan or motorhome. It comes with an integrated handle and an internal divider, allowing you to sort your food and drink into different sections.

Hot or cold

The Outwell ECOcool isn't limited to cooling, choose between cooling your food and drinks 18-25 °C below ambient temperature, or warming them up to 50-60 °C.

Fits Your Favourites

24L capacity holds enough food and drinks for a small group, while the internal divider helps you keep things organized. The cooler is tall enough to hold standard 1.75L bottles upright

Outwell ECOcool Features:

  • Dark blue colour
  • Hot or cold mode
  • 24L storage capacity
  • Can operate on both 12v and 230v - both leads supplied
  • Uses high density PU foam for enhanced insulation

Product Name: Lagun Campervan Table Leg Frame & Mounting Plate
Product Description:
Lagun Campervan Table Leg Frame & Mounting Plate

The Lagun Campervan Table Leg allows for excellent table stability on the go with its adjustable mounting system. Designed and built with space-saving solutions and strength in mind, the Lagun table leg offers unparalleled strength and versatility for your campervan or boat.

Campervan and Marine use in mind

The leg supports up to 15kg and can hold table tops up to 850mm x 550mm. The leg is constructed from saltwater-resistant anodized aluminium for lasting performance while out at sea. Lagun table leg system is available in silver or black adonised finish.

Unmatched Adjustability

Two independent swivel points allow for effortless 360° swivel. Fine-tune the height through the mounting plate for optimal comfort and convenience.

Lagun Table Leg Features

  • Easily swivels out of the way when no longer needed
  • Lever handles for easy adjustment
  • Made from seawater resistant anodized aluminium
  • Includes one mounting plate for mounting on furniture or walls
  • Table arm sleeves made of glass fibre reinforced plastic

Table Leg Frame & Mounting Plate Technical Information

  • 360° swivel
  • Weight: 3.5kg
  • Max Load: 15kg
  • Arm: 400mm
  • Leg: 500mm
  • Available in Silver or Carbon (Black)
  • EAN: 7332435306055

Product Name: Igloo ICF80DZ Mains or 12/24 Volt Dual Zone Electric Cool Box
Product Description:
Igloo ICF80DZ Mains or 12/24 Volt Dual Zone Electric Cool Box

Introducing the Igloo ICF Iceless Electric Cooler

Revolutionize your cooling experience with the Igloo ICF Electric Cooler. Say goodbye to the hassle of ice and hello to ultimate temperature control. This spacious 78L cooler can function as a fridge or freezer, delivering powerful cooling performance without the need for ice. The dual zone compartments can be programmed independently to chill one zone, and freeze the other.

Enjoy precise temperature management from a crisp -17°C to a refreshing 20°C, ensuring your drinks, snacks, or frozen treats stay perfectly chilled wherever you go. Simply plug into a standard wall outlet or your vehicle's auxiliary power outlet for effortless convenience. Experience the future of cooling with the ICF – your on-the-go temperature control solution.

Igloo ICF80DZ Fridge Features:

  • Dual Power Source: Operates on both household electricity AC (EU plug) and 12/24V DC vehicle power (Cables included).
  • Dual Zone Cooling: Separate compartments allow independent temperature control, enabling you to chill beverages and store perishables simultaneously while camping.
  • Spacious Capacity: 78-litre interior holds up to 121 cans, ideal for storing food and drinks for extended trips.
  • Digital Display: Easy-to-read digital display with adjustable brightness for setting and monitoring temperatures.
  • Interior LED Lighting: Provides clear visibility inside the cooler for effortless access to contents.
  • Removable Divider: Allows for flexible organization of the interior space.
  • Built-in Battery Protection: Prevents car battery drain by automatically shutting off the cooler when voltage drops.
  • Durable Build: Built to withstand outdoor use.

ICF80DZ Specifications:

  • Capacity: 78 Litres
  • Dimensions (L x W x H): 87.40cm x 44.70cm x 49.50cm
  • Weight: 20.95kg
  • Temperature range: -17°C to 20°C
  • Product Code: 00050632

Product Name: Truma Hose with High Rupture Protection 450mm G.12DE
Product Description:
Truma Hose with High Rupture Protection - 450mm (G.12DE)

Stay safe and connected on your camping adventures with the Truma Hose with HRP!

This essential accessory is designed for use with refillable propane and butane gas cylinders in your your caravan, motorhomes and campervans. It features a vital safety function: Hose Rupture Protection (HRP).  In the event of hose damage, HRP automatically stops the gas flow, giving you peace of mind.

Key Features:

  • Safe and Secure: Hose Rupture Protection (HRP) ensures automatic shut-off in case of damage.
  • Easy Connection: Connects your Campko gas cylinder to a Truma bulkhead regulator.
  • Perfect Length: 450mm hose provides convenient reach.
  • Trusted Standards: Conforms to EN 16436-2 for safe use with butane and propane.
  • Maximum pressure: 30 mbar

Ensure a safe and reliable gas connection in your caravan, motorhome or campervan with the Truma Hose with HRP

Enhance Your RV with the AD400600 Rooflight (with LED light)

Introducing the Adventurer AD400600

A high-quality rooflight designed to enhance ventilation and natural light in your caravan, campervan, or motorhome.

Features

  • Effortless Operation: The AD400600 features a gas lift spring for smooth and easy opening and closing.
  • Double Glazed Insulation: The double-glazed dome top provides excellent thermal insulation, keeping your campervan caravan or motorhome aired in summer and warm in winter.

  • Adjustable Ventilation: The rooflight opens to a maximum angle of 60° with three locking positions for customised ventilation control.
  • Privacy and Protection: The interior frame includes a blackout blind for privacy and a fly screen to keep insects out.
  • Effective Ventilation: The Adventurer AD400600 allows for up to 150 cubic centimetres of permanent ventilation, helping to reduce condensation and maintain a fresh, comfortable environment.

Product Description:
Vango Soul 100 Tent

Lightweight, Fast Pitch 1-Man Adventure Tent

The Vango Soul 100 tent is a lightweight, easy-to-pitch tent ideal for solo campers who prioritise quick setup and minimal weight. With a tunnel design and just two poles, you can have your camp ready in under 7 minutes, leaving more time to explore the outdoors. The Soul 100 allows for inner-first pitching which is particularly beneficial in dry weather as it allows you to use the inner tent alone for a more airy setup. The compact size and light weight makes the Vango Soul Tent ideal for festivals, bike, hiking and backpacking adventures.

 

The Vango Soul 100 utilises space by providing a storage are at the front of the tent, offering a versatile sleeping space. With material made from highly waterproof flysheet and a 3000mm hydrostatic head, this tent is perfect for drizzly weather, ideal for keeping you and your equipment dry. The Vango Soul 100 is the ultimate lightweight tent for solo adventures and group explorations. Get yours today!

 

Vango Soul Tent Features:

  • Breathable Inner: The inner tent is made from a breathable polyester fabric. This allows moisture vapor from your breath and perspiration to escape, preventing condensation buildup and keeping you comfortable throughout the night.
  • Ventilation Points: Strategically placed mesh panels and vents throughout the tent allow for additional airflow. This helps to reduce condensation further and keeps the inside fresh, especially on warm or humid nights.
  • Part Mesh Inner Door: The inner door utilizes a combination of solid fabric and mesh panels. This allows for ventilation while keeping bugs and insects at bay.
  • Lantern Hanging Points: Dedicated loops are strategically placed inside the tent for hanging a lantern, providing illumination for night-time activities.
  • Inner Pockets: Handy pockets located within the inner tent offer convenient storage for small essentials like your headlamp, phone, or headlamp.
  • Reflective Guylines:  Reflective guy ropes have reflective material woven into them. This makes them easier to see in low-light conditions, preventing accidental tripping while secure the tent in windy conditions.

Vango Soul 100 Specifications:

Vango Soul 100 Specification
Weight 1.82 kg
Pack Size 50 x Ø14 cm
Capacity 1 Person Tent
Pitching Time Approx. 7 mins
Material Protex 70D Polyester
Waterproof Rating 3000mm HH
Height 90 cm
Length 250 cm
Width 100 cm

Product Name: Igloo ICF18 Electric Cool Box Mains or 12/24 Volt
Product Description:
Igloo ICF18 Electric Cool Box Mains or 12/24 Volt

Introducing the Igloo ICF Iceless Electric Cooler

Revolutionize your cooling experience with the Igloo ICF Electric Cooler. Say goodbye to the hassle of ice and hello to ultimate temperature control. This spacious 18L cooler can function as a fridge or freezer, delivering powerful cooling performance without the need for ice.

Enjoy precise temperature management from a crisp -17°C to a refreshing 20°C, ensuring your drinks, snacks, or frozen treats stay perfectly chilled wherever you go. Simply plug into a standard wall outlet or your vehicle's auxiliary power outlet for effortless convenience. Experience the future of cooling with the ICF – your on-the-go temperature control solution.

Product Features:

  • Dual Power Source: Operates on both household electricity AC (EU plug) and 12/24V DC vehicle power (Cables included).
  • Temperature Control: Adjustable temperature range from -17°C to 20°C, allowing you to switch between fridge and freezer settings.
  • Spacious Capacity: 18-litre interior holds up to 29 cans, ideal for storing food and drinks for extended trips.
  • Digital Display: Easy-to-read digital display with adjustable brightness for setting and monitoring temperatures.

Product Name: Easy Camp Blazar 300 or 400 Dome Tent
Product Description:
Easy Camp Blazar 300 and 400 Tent

Compact 3 and 4 man dome tent

The Easy Camp Blazar is available in a 3 and 4 person tent. Choose from the Blazar 300, perfect for couples weekend or festival camping or the Blazar 400, ideal for family camping or couples looking for additional stays for a longer break. Both tents have a spacious sleeping area with storage pockets, hanging lantern loops and a sleep tight inner tent. The darkened fabric reduces light and offers a more comfortable sleep in the evening and early morning.

Easy Camp Blazar has an extended porch which provides ample room for gear storage, cooking, or simply relaxing under the stars. The porch features a detachable groundsheet, a large front door flanked by two large windows, rainproof air vents and handy lantern hanging points. 

This lightweight, fibre-glass poled awning is quick and easy to pitch making it the ideal tent for smaller groups or couples for a weekend away on a camping trip, or at a festival. Choose from the 3 or 4 person versions, 4 person available in Rustic Green or Steel Blue.

Easy Camp Blazar 300 Tent Specifications

Product Description:
Outwell Wolfburg 450 Air Driveaway Campervan Awning

With its spacious design, easy setup, and all-weather protection, the Outwell Wolfburg 450 Air Driveaway Awning is a perfect choice for campers who want to extend their living area and create a comfortable home away from home. Versatile pitching options allow you to position the awning with the front facing either the cab or the rear to suit your needs.

Generous Space and Privacy

Ideal for families with children or groups of friends, the Wolfburg 450 Air provides ample room to relax, dine, and store gear. Enjoy privacy with a fully enclosed awning and tinted windows, will toggle-up curtains for night-time.

Easy Setup and Flexibility

The awning features the Outwell Rigid Air System for quick and hassle-free pitching. Attach the awning to either the side of your campervan, facing either the front or back. Dual beading ensures a secure connection to your campervan.

Wolfburg 450 Air Driveaway Awning Features

  • Large interior space
  • Two large side doors with insect-proof mesh screens
  • Fire retardant material
  • Quick inflation
  • Dual beading
  • Sewn-in groundsheet
  • Toggle-up curtains and tinted windows
  • Heavy duty storm straps
  • Cable entry point
  • Taped seams ensure a watertight seal
  • Colour-coded pegging system for fast, accurate and stable set-up

Product Name: Dometic NRX 50 Campervan Motorhome 12v Compressor Fridge
Product Description:
Dometic NRX50 Campervan 12v Compressor Fridge Freezer

The Dometic NRX50C 12v Campervan & Motorhome 12v Compressor Fridge is a practical and efficient 44 litre compressor fridge designed for keeping your food and drinks cool. Its modern design features a dark grey front panel and a full-width handle for effortless opening. A key feature is its configurable interior. You can use it solely as a fridge, a dedicated freezer, or a combination of both! The removable 4.4-litre freezer compartment offers flexibility based on your needs.

Dometic NRX50 Key Features:

  • What's New?: The Dometic NRX50 12v Campervan & Motorhome Fridge achieves top ratings in energy consumption, gaining a 9% improvement compared to the previous CRX model (CRX50). This translates to lower energy use and reduced battery drain on your vehicle's electrical system.
  • 3-in-1 Cooling Solution: This innovative feature provides the ultimate in versatility. Need a spacious campervan fridge for a weekend trip? Simply remove the freezer compartment. Going on a longer camping trip and require frozen food storage? Keep the freezer compartment in place. The removable design allows you to adjust the configuration to perfectly suit your requirements.
  • Energy-Efficient with 3 Modes: The premium compressor features three operational modes: Eco, Boost, and Silent. Eco mode prioritizes low energy consumption, ideal for extended use while preserving cooling performance. Conversely, Boost mode rapidly cools down the Dometic NRX50 Campervan & Motorhome Fridge after restocking groceries. Finally, Silent mode minimizes noise output, perfect for night-time use or enjoying the peacefulness of the outdoors.
  • Space-Saving Design: The bevelled rear side maximizes space utilization, particularly valuable in compact areas like your campervan or motorhome. This thoughtful design ensures the fridge fits seamlessly without compromising valuable living space.
  • Reversible Door Hinge for Easy Installation: The door hinge can be conveniently mounted on either the left or right side of the unit. This flexibility allows you to configure the Dometic NRX50 Dometic Campervan & Motorhome Fridge's layout to best suit the available space in your vehicle.
  • Dual Function Locks with Ventilation: The Dometic NRX50 12v Campervan & Motorhome Fridge features locks that serve a double purpose. They secure the contents of the refrigerator while also functioning as vents. During periods of non-use, you can activate the vent function to promote air circulation and prevent moisture build-up inside the fridge.
  • Winter Mode for All-Weather Performance: Even in colder climates, the Winter Mode ensures optimal performance. This mode creates a slight gap between the door and the fridge body, allowing for air circulation to prevent moisture build-up and potential mould growth.

Manuals:

Diagnostics

  • CR/CRX Flashes Chart
  • Danfoss Compressor Diagnostics
  • Coolmatic CR Troubleshooter

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Cayman Midi Air Drive Away Awning
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Cayman Midi Air Low 180 - 210cm

Drive Away Campervan Awning

Specifically designed for weekends away, short stays and road trips, the Outdoor Revolution Cayman Midi Air Low is a perfect driveaway awning for couples, families and small groups. It is fitted with a single inflation point, which allows for an easy, effortless and stress-free installation and set-up. The design is based on the Cayman Air driveaway awning and has an internal floor space of 250 x 250 cm and a connection width of 190cm, the Outdoor Revolution Cayman Midi Air awning is a compact version, ideal for smaller vehicles. With large roll-back doors on 2 of the 3 sides and a modern front facing canopy with roll-up doors on both sides, accessibility and adaptability is built into the product. Clear PVC windows and adjustable toggle-in blinds provide additional flexibility in regards to controlling lighting and privacy at any time of day. Ventilation through mesh points and a sewn-in groundsheet allow for fresh air and protection from the elements. The Cayman Midi Air Low awning is loaded with features and provides excellent value for money for those searching for a reliable camping experience. The Outdoor Revolution Cayman Air Low Awning is designed to fit a VW T6/T5 vans and campervans with heights between 180 and 210cm.

Cayman Midi Air Driveaway Features:

  • Hydrostatic head 3,000mm
  • Single inflation Dura-Tech welded oxygen air frame system
  • Zip-back front & side doors
  • Roof ventilation system with velcro down storm cover
  • Clear PVC windows with toggle-in privacy blinds
  • Integral, vehicle front facing eyebrow canopy with fibreglass pole
  • 4mm & 6mm twin keder connection strip
  • Side Phoenix mesh ventilation panel with external roll up cover
  • Twin rear-zip back cowl access doors
  • Sewn in PE groundsheet with fold down access door up stands
  • Clips to add an optional Two Berth Inner Tent (optional extra)
  • Includes manual air pump, peg set & carry bag

Driveaway Awning Specification:

  • Weight - 14.09 Kg
  • Packaging Size - 82 x 42 x 38cm
  • Footprint - 250 x 250cm (plus 80cm cowl depth)
  • Rail Connection height - 190cm
  • Height Range - 180cm - 210cm
Product Warranty: Outdoor Revolution drive away awnings come with a 12 month warranty against manufacturing faults.
Product Availability: Cayman Midi Awning is sent via next working day courier

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Movelite T3E T4E Awning Bedroom Annexe
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Movelite Driveaway Awning Annexe T3E/T4E

Movelite T3E / T4E awning bedroom or storage annexe

The Movelite Awning Annexe is designed as the perfect extension for the Outdoor Revolution T3E or T4E Driveaway Awning. Simply zip out the rear panel on the awning, zip this in, and pitch using a single pole for easy and convenient installation. It comes with an internal sewn-in groundsheet, which allows for the bedroom inner tent to be removed and act as an additional living space or storage for your campervan. Made from the same lightweight materials as the awning, it retains the simplicity of the set up process and the quality of Outdoor Revolution. The 240 HDE high density all weather fabric is designed to produce smaller and more compact pack sizes when folding, and the material has a Hydroatatic Head Rating of 4,000mm with taped seems throughout, which means it is incredibly waterproof and weather resistent. This annexe is designed to add an additional 2 adults or 3 children to the main driveaway anwing. It serves as a tall sleeping extension, complimented with a darkened "twilight" micro-polyster 2-berth sleeping pod, adding an extra element of luxury and comfort to your campervan.

Campervan Awning Sleeping Annexe Features

  • 240HDE Hex Lightweight Polyester Fabric
  • Single steel pole frame
  • Zip on weather proof attachment
  • 2 Berth Inner Tent
  • Designed to fit the Movelite T3E and T4E
  • Includes peg set and carry bag

Specifications

  • Total Weight - 7.13kg
  • Pack Size - 76 x 24 x 2cm
  • Footprint - 200 x 190cm
Product Warranty: Outdoor Revolution drive away awnings come with a 12 month limited warranty against manufacturing faults.

Product Description:
CTA Campervan Seat Swivel Plate VW T5 / T6

VW T5 / T6 Swivel Plate

This CTA Swivel Plate is suitable for any Volkswagen Campervan T5 or T6 model from 2003 to present day. It can be fitted on either the passenger or driver side of the vehicle and swivel both left and right, no need for left or right hands. Comes complete with necessary fixing nuts and bolts along with instructions for easy installation and fitting at home. 

CTA are renowned for their high quality swivel plates. The VW campervan swivel plate features a lightweight design and construction. It has been crash tested and CE approved, allowing Volkwagen Transporter owners to unlock extra functionality and comfort when on the road in a safe manner. The robust steel construction with a powdercoated black finish ensures quality in the product.

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Movelite T3E Driveaway Campervan Awning
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Movelite T3E Driveaway Campervan Awning

The Movelite T3E is a premium driveaway awning from Outdoor Revolution, designed to offer flexibility, comfort, and weather protection for your campervan or motorhome adventures. Available in Low or Mid heights.

Modular Design for Adaptable Space

This versatile awning allows you to create a space as small or large as you need. In its standard configuration, it features a spacious open porch, perfect for relaxing or socializing outdoors. Expand the living area by adding the optional porch door (sold separately) to enclose the porch. This creates a large sheltered space with room for extra bedroom pods. Need even more protection? Zip on a sun canopy for the porch (sold separately), and add a rear sleeping annex (sold separately) for a private sleeping area without sacrificing living space in the main awning.

Durable and Weatherproof

Constructed from high-tech, lightweight 240HDE polyester, the Movelite T3E has a 4000mm hydrostatic head rating, making it exceptionally waterproof and able to withstand various weather conditions. The awning comes with a fully sewn-in groundsheet for added comfort and protection from the elements.

Outdoor Revolution Movelite T3E Bundle Features

  • 240HDE Hex high density lightweight fabric
  • Inflatable frame
  • Zip-back front door with a mesh ventilation bug screen
  • Integral front canopy with windows
  • Tinted roof light windows
  • Left & right hand access doors
  • Interconnecting cowl door with ventilation for easy vehicle access
  • Tinted PVC windows with zip-up curtains
  • Hanging points for optional bedroom tents
  • High visibility guylines
  • 4mm & 6mm twin connection piping
  • Adjustable pegging system with elastic bungee intermediates
  • Includes pump, peg set, storm straps & carry bag
  • Porch door & rear annexe accessory options

Movelite T3E Driveaway Awning Specifications

  • Weight: 21.16kg
  • Pack Size: 80cm x 47cm x 33cm
  • Footprint: 310cm x 375cm (+120cm cowl depth)
  • Rail Connection Width: 245cm
  • Hydrostatic Head: 4000mm
  • Low Height Range: 180cm - 220cm
  • Mid Height Range: 220cm - 255cm (Suitable for Ducato and Crafter)
Product Warranty: The Outdoor Revolution Movelite T3E comes with a 1 year limited warranty
Product Availability: The Movelite T3E is available via next day delivery

CTA Campervan Seat Swivel Plate - Mercedes Sprinter 2006 onwards / Volkswagen Crafter 2006 to 2016

CTA Seat Swivel - Mercedes Sprinter 2006 onwards / Volkswagen Crafter 2006 to 2016

This CTA swivel plate is suitable for Mercedes Sprinter Campervan's produced after 2019 and VW Crafter Campervans's produced between 2006 and 2016. Highlightinig its flexibility, it can be fitted on either the driver or passenger side, it is also compatable with both left and right hand drive vehicles. It comes complete with a full fitting kit, which includes all the necessary fixings and bolts for easy at-home installation.

CTA produce high quality swivels and this is no different. The swivel plate highlights a lightweight design with sturdy steel construction. Black powder coating, which is CNC formed, aide in creating a strong support to the seat whilst on the road. It has been CE approved and crash tested to ensure maximum quality and safety.

Mercedes Sprinter 2006 onwards / VW Crafter 2006 to 2016 - Features

  • Can be fitted on driver or passenger side
  • Suitable for left or right hand drive
  • Fixtures and Fittings included

Mercedes Sprinter 2019 onwards / VW Crafter 2006 to 2016 - Specifications

  • Dimensions: 460mm L x 455mm W x 53mm H
  • Material: High Strength Steel
  • Finish: Black with Powdercoating

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Movelite T3E Driveaway Campervan Awning Bundle
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Movelite T3E Driveaway Campervan Awning Bundle

The Movelite T3E is a premium driveaway awning from Outdoor Revolution, designed to offer flexibility, comfort, and weather protection for your campervan or motorhome adventures. Available in Low or Mid heights.

Modular Design for Adaptable Space

This versatile awning allows you to create a space as small or large as you need. In its standard configuration, it features a spacious open porch, perfect for relaxing or socializing outdoors. Expand the living area by adding the porch door, this creates a large sheltered space with room for extra bedroom pods. Need even more protection? Zip on the sun canopy and add a rear sleeping annex (sold separately) for a private sleeping area without sacrificing living space in the main awning. Also included is the groundsheet to protect the bottom of your awning, and the carpet for wall-to-wall comfort underfoot.

Durable and Weatherproof

Constructed from high-tech, lightweight 240HDE polyester, the Movelite T3E has a 4000mm hydrostatic head rating, making it exceptionally waterproof and able to withstand various weather conditions. The awning comes with a fully sewn-in groundsheet for added comfort and protection from the elements.

Movelite T3E Driveaway Awning Features

  • 240HDE Hex high density lightweight fabric
  • Inflatable frame
  • Zip-back front door with a mesh ventilation bug screen
  • Integral front canopy with windows
  • Tinted roof light windows
  • Left & right hand access doors
  • Interconnecting cowl door with ventilation for easy vehicle access
  • Tinted PVC windows with zip-up curtains
  • Hanging points for optional bedroom tents
  • High visibility guylines
  • 4mm & 6mm twin connection piping
  • Adjustable pegging system with elastic bungee intermediates
  • Includes pump, peg set, storm straps & carry bag
  • Bundle includes awning, groundsheet, carpet, canopy and porch door.

Outdoor Revolution Movelite T3E Specifications

  • Weight: 21.16kg
  • Pack Size: 80cm x 47cm x 33cm
  • Footprint: 310cm x 375cm (+120cm cowl depth)
  • Rail Connection Width: 245cm
  • Hydrostatic Head: 4000mm
  • Low Height Range: 180cm - 220cm
  • Mid Height Range: 220cm - 255cm (Suitable for Ducato and Crafter)
Product Warranty: The Outdoor Revolution Movelite T3E comes with a 1 year limited warranty
Product Availability: The Movelite T3E bundle is available via next day delivery

Product Name: CTA Drivers Seat Spacer Kit - Ford Transit - 2014 - Onwards
Product Description:
CTA Drivers Seat Spacer Kit - Ford Transit 2014 - Onwards

Drivers Side Seat Spacer Kit - Ford Transit

A seat spacer adapter set produced by CTA which is a complimentary product to their Ford Transit (2014 - YTD) seat swivel plates. It provides an easy solution to drivers side installation by raising the drivers side seat, and is suitable for LHD or RHD. The Spacer kit enables users to confidently fit and better operate their Ford Transit Swivel Plates.

Comes complete with relevant fixtures, fittings and instructions for safe and easy installation.

Please note: The handbrake needs to be lowered to allow for safe installation. The parking brake needs to be in operation to rotate the drivers side seat. Compatable with the Ford Transit Swivel Plates 2014+ (SKU: 9PG0090000V01).

Features - Seat Spacer Kit - Ford Transit 2014+

  • Complimentary to CTA Swivel Plate - Ford Transit - 2014+
  • Suitable for Left Hand Drive (LHD) or Right Hand Drive vehicles (RHD)
  • Allows for safe installation of drivers side seat swivel
  • Fixtures, fittings and instructions included

Specifications - Seat Spacer Kit - Ford Transit 2014+

  • Material: Steel
  • Finish: Black powder coated
  • Compatable with the Ford Transit Swivel Plates 2014+ 9PG0090000V01 and Ford Transit / Tourneo Hand Brake Adapter 2012 - 2023 9PG015600V01

Product Name: CTA Campervan Swivel Plate - Ford Transit / Tourneo Custom (2012 onwards) / Transit Custom Model V362 (2012-2023)
Product Description:
CTA Campervan Swivel Plate - Ford Transit / Tourneo Custom (2012 onwards) and Transit Custom Model V362 (2012-2023)

Ford Transit / Transit Custom / Tourneo Campervan Swivel Plate

This CTA swivel plate is suitable for Ford Transit or Tourneo campervan models from 2012 to present day. It can be fitted on either the drivers or passenger side of the camper and can swivel either way, so it is compatable with both Left Hand Drive vehicles and Right Hand Drive camper vans. It comes complete with all the nedded fixtures, fittings and instructions to allow for easy installation.

CTA design incredibly high quality seat swivels. The Transit swivel plate features a lightweight design and construction. It has been crash tested and CE approved, allowing Ford Transit owners to unlock extra functionality and comfort when on the road in a safe manner. The sturdy steel construction with a powdercoated black finish ensures quality and longevity in the product.

Please note: Compatible with Ford Transit Custom models from 2012-2023. Non-compatable with electric seats and double seat bases (only single seat bases). Additional products are required for drivers side installation, a spacer and a break adaptor.

Ford Transit / Tourneo Campervans - Features

  • Fixtures and Fittings included
  • Can be fitted on either driver or passenger side of vehicle
  • Suitable for either left or right hand drive

Ford Transit / Tourneo Campervans - Specifications

  • Material: Durable and Lightweight Steel
  • Finish: Black with Powdercoating
  • Additional parts for drivers side installation include: CTA Handbrake Adatper - Ford Transit / Tourneo - 9PG0152600V01. CTA Ford Transit Drivers Seat Spacer Kit - 9PG0083700V01
  • Suitable for Ford Transit and Tourneo campervans. Transit (2014 onwards), Transit Custom (2012 onwards) and Tourneo Custom (2012 onwards)

Product Name: Remis Rooflight Vista Camper Van Caravan 40 x 40 Skylight
Product Description:
Remis Vista Caravan & Motorhome Rooflight

Vista Campervan Skylight - Product Information

Premium quality rooflight from Remis. This modern aerodynamic campervan rooflight is suitable for all standard caravans and motorhomes with a roof thickness of between 28 mm and 42 mm and is for fitting in to 40 x 40cm apertures. The design is sleek and discreet.

The caravan Rooflight is versatile and can be titled up to 60 degrees, with 3 different opening angles. It has a tinted outer window pane and comes with a pleated black-out screen, which gives the user greater control and flexibility when out-and-about and dealing with the elements. In addition, the Remis Vista campervan rooflight comes complete with an insect protection blind to provide users extra protection. The structure of the Remis Vista motorhome Rooflight is flat and has an optimised water management system. The vent has fixed ventilation, however, this can be interrupted with an insert during installation if required or desired.

Remis Vista Rooflight - Features

  • Optimised water management
  • 3-tier notched positioner
  • Lockable fan position
  • Insect protection blind and Pleated black-out / darkening blind

Remis Vista Skylight - Specifications

  • Roof thickness required: 28 - 42 mm
  • Cut-out dimensions: 40 x 40 cm
  • Weight: 3.5kg
  • Adjustable up to 60 degrees
Product Availability: In stock & sent on a next working day delivery.

Product Name: REMIfront Cab Blinds Blackout System - Ford Transit Van 2014-2019
Product Description:
REMIfront Cab Blinds Blackout System - Ford Transit 2014-2019

Remis Blackout Blinds - Description

The Remis window blackout blinds are designed and produced to keep sunlight from entering your Ford Transit campervan and provide an extra element of privacy when on the road. This part of the blackout system is designed to fit the right-hand side of the cab door window and comes in a pre-assembled state. It is designed to be easy to install and easy to use, with a drawing mechanic moving from left to right and an integrated magnetic catch / latch. This helps to prevent cracks of sunlight peering through your campervan in the early hours of the morning! However, the pleated material and construction of the blinds allows you to effortlessly customise the level of light going into the Transit campervan.

Please Note: This product is not designed to provide additional protection against external elements, however, will provide an element of cooling due to the sun blocking features of the Blackout system. Additionally, they are not suitable for Ford Custom models. Remis Blackout System / Blinds are not suitable for vehicles with active airbags within the A pillars or above doors, or for a Transit fitted with a mounted sensor.

Please Note: We are unable to ship Remis blinds to Northern Ireland

RemiFront Campervan Blinds - Features

  • Pre-assembled and easy to install
  • Magnetic catch for a secure draw
  • Carefully placed ventilation openings
  • Lightweight pleated finish
  • Fold away in a tidy manner to avoid obstruction when driving

RemiFront Campervan Blinds - Specifications

  • Intended for usage with the Ford Transit from 2014-2019
  • 0.55 cm thick
  • Not suitable for vehicles and campervans with active airbags in A pillars or doors above

REMIfront Cab Blinds Blackout System - Ford Transit 2019-YTD
Product Description:
Remis Remifront Cab Blackout Blinds - Ford Transit (2019 onwards)

Remis Blackout Blinds - Description

The Remis window blackout blinds are designed and produced to keep sunlight from entering your Ford Transit campervan and provide an extra element of privacy when staying in your Transit campervan. It comes equipped with a two-piece blind system, which closes in the center of the windscreen. The blackout system is designed to be easy and convenient in regards to set-up, it comes pre-assembled and is secured to the vehicle using it's existing door frames. There is a magnetic latch imbedded within the blackout system, which makes securing your blinds easy! The pleated material and construction of the blinds allows you to effortlessly customise the level of light going into the Ford Transit camper van, from blackout darkness to allowing natural light in.

The blinds are available for the windscreen only, both doors only, or as a full set including all of them.

Please Note: This product is not designed to provide additional protection against external elements, however, the blinds will provide an element of cooling due to the sun blocking features of the Blackout system. Additionally, they are not suitable for Ford Custom models. Remis Blackout System / Blinds are not suitable for vehicles with active airbags within the A pillars or above the doors, or for a Transit with a fitted mounted sensor.

Please Note: We are unable to ship Remis blinds to Northern Ireland

Camping adventures and parties just got a whole lot cooler

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Movelite T2R Driveaway Campervan Awning
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Movelite T2R Campervan & Motorhome Driveaway Awning

The Movelite T2R is the latest innovation in driveaway awnings from Outdoor Revolution. This premium awning offers exceptional space, reliable weather protection, and high-end features, making it the perfect companion for any outdoor adventure with your Campervan or Motorhome.

Fantastic Features

The Movelite T2R features a sturdy air frame that's quick and easy to pitch. The signature DSV inflation valves and Intelligent Frame pressure relief valves ensure effortless inflation and safeguard against over-pressure. The awning features 2 large roll-back doors with full cover bug nets to allow for full ventilation with no unwanted pests. Large tinted PVC windows allow for a bright living space whilst providing privacy.

Adaptable for Any Vehicle

Available in three heights, the Movelite T2R perfectly matches the size of your campervan or motorhome. The connecting tunnel with ventilation and access doors on both sides provides a convenient passage between your awning and vehicle.

Features

  • Sturdy air frame with dynamic speed & intelligent valve system
  • Front and side doors can be fully zipped back
  • Bug net on front and side door for bug-free ventilation
  • Lower ventilation in main living area
  • Large connecting tunnel with ventilation and left & right hand access doors
  • Tinted PVC windows
  • Privacy curtains
  • Hanging points for optional inner tent
  • Reflective guylines
  • 4mm & 6mm connection rail
  • Adjustable pegging system with elastic bungees
  • Includes pump, peg set, storm straps & carry bag

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Movelite T4E Driveaway Campervan Awning
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Movelite T4E Campervan & Motorhome Driveaway Awning

The Movelite T4E is the latest innovation in driveaway awnings from Outdoor Revolution. This premium awning offers exceptional space, reliable weather protection, and high-end features, making it the perfect companion for any outdoor adventure with your Campervan or Motorhome.

Modular Design for Adaptable Space

This versatile awning allows you to create a space as small or large as you need. In its standard configuration, it features a spacious open porch, perfect for relaxing or socializing outdoors. Expand the living area by adding the porch door, this creates a large sheltered space with room for extra bedroom pods. Need even more protection? Zip on the sun canopy and add a rear sleeping annex (sold separately) for a private sleeping area without sacrificing living space in the main awning. Also included is the groundsheet to protect the bottom of your awning, and the carpet for wall-to-wall comfort underfoot.

Adaptable for Any Motorhome

Available in three heights, the Movelite T4E perfectly matches the size of your campervan or motorhome. The connecting tunnel with ventilation and access doors on both sides provides a convenient passage between your driveaway awning and vehicle.

Outdoor Revolution Movelite T4E Features

  • 240HDE Hex high density lightweight fabric
  • Inflatable frame
  • Zip-back front door with a mesh ventilation bug screen
  • Integral front canopy with windows
  • Tinted roof light windows
  • Left & right hand access doors

  • Tinted PVC windows with zip-up curtains

Eclipse Pro 330 Inflatable Caravan Awning Overview:

The Eclipse Pro 330 inflatable caravan awning is perfectly designed for touring caravans and motorhomes with a width of 3.3 metre. It's easy to put up and take down, providing plenty of ventilation for warm weather and offering an optional conservatory annex for extra space.

The Eclipse pro 330 Inflatable Caravan Awning Features:

  • Dura-Tech fully welded air frame with single point inflation.
  • Quick and easy pitching.
  • Intelligent Frame system: This system regulates the air pressure in the awning's inflatable tubes, protecting them from over-inflation. Outdoor Revolution also provides a lifetime air tube guarantee for the Eclipse Pro 330.
  • Ventilation: This porch awning has ample ventilation with a zip mesh making it perfect for warmer climates.
  • Optional Conservatory Annex: Allowing you to create a windowed conservatory space, storage space or large sleeping area.
  • The Eclipse Pro 330 Inflatable Caravan Awning includes: A pump, peg set, draught skirt, storm straps, and a carry bag.

Product Name: Igloo Sunset 60 Roller Camping Cooler Box in Rugged Blue
Product Description:
Igloo 60 Quart / 56 Litre Sunset Roller Cooler - Rugged Blue

The Igloo 60 Quart (56 Litre) Sunset Roller Cool Box is the perfect accessory for days at the waterfront, adventures in the heat or pit stops on road trips. The heavy-duty injection molded wheels draw attention to the quality, longevity and flexibility of the Wheeled Coolbox. Flip-up handles on the cooler box allow for presice placement and easy transportation from the boot of a car. At the end of the day you can use the handy triple snap drain feature to easily clear out the wheeled cooler to facilitate easy cleaning. The Igloo Sunset rolling cool box is built to last, and can serve a variety of outdoors / camping related purposes while being able to be taken anywhere.

Please Note: The Igloo 60 QT Sunset Roller Cooler is only available in the Rugged Blue colour, the images above are purely for illustrative purposes.

Extra Convenience for Epic Camping Trips

The chest inspired design can fit the cool box into the boot of most modern campers, making it the perfect addition for any camping trip. There is a built-in media slot strategically placed on the top of the cooler, which desigined to be able to hold-up most modern phones and tablets. In addition, the media slot is complimented by four cupholders, also molded into the lid, adding an extra element of versatility and comfortability when on a camping trip, at a picnic, or a local sports match! The large storage capabilities only adds to this convenience, you can pack in plenty of drinks and snacks for a large group of people for any occasion, from camping to day trips.

Features - Igloo 60 QT / 56 Litre Sunset Roller Cool Box

  • Media holder/slot and four cupholders built into the lid
  • Convenient flip-up side handles
  • Triple snap drain plug
  • Heavy-duty injection molded wheels
  • Retractable handle.

Product Name: Cadac Trio Power Pak Portable Gas Supply
Product Description:
Cadac Dometic Trio Power Pak Portable Gas Supply

A convenient and portable gas supply for outdoor cooking

The Cadac Trio Power Pak Portable Gas Supply eliminates the need for bulky gas cylinders, making it perfect for camping, barbecue, picnics, and caravanning. It's lightweight and features a removable back cover for effortless insertion of 3 x 227g gas cartridges (Not Included). No more wrestling with heavy gas bottles! Enjoy approximately 7 hours of cooking time for small barbecues with the Trio Power Pak's efficient fuel usage. The included storage bag keeps everything organized and protected during transport and storage.

Cadac Dometic Trio Power Pak Portable Gas Supply Features:

  • lightweight but sturdy materials and smart portable design
  • The Cadac Trio Power Pak uses readily available and affordable 3 x 227g gas cartridge inserts (Not Included).
  • The Trio Power Pak can also use cartridges containing different amounts of gas and can also work with only 1 or 2 gas cartridges meaning there's no need to replace all 3 at the same time.
  • Provides around 7 hours of cooking time for small BBQs
  • Removable back cover for easy cartridge insertion: No need to remove the entire unit for refilling
  • Removable hose with Cadac QR Connector: Simplifies connection and disconnection. Simply click to connect and disconnect with just one hand, no need for complicated screwing or tools
  • Connects to BBQ and Stove with handwheel tailpiece assembly: Ensures a secure and leak-proof connection.
  • By combining the gas supply of the 3 cartridges the Trio Power Pak slows them from freezing which means your barbecue or stove can be used at lower temperatures
  • Works with various Cadac barbecue and stove. (Check compatibility before purchase)
  • Includes storage bag
Technical Specifications:
  • Unpackaged Weight: 1.55 kg
  • Packaged Weight: 1.8 kg

  • Packaged Dimensions (DxHxW): 275 × 190 × 222 mm

  • Unpackaged Dimensions (DxHxW): 160 x 250 x 250 mm
Product Warranty: The Cadac Trio Power Pak comes with a 2 year manufacturer warranty.

Product Description:
Fiamma Easy Dry Camping Carry-Bike Airer

Laundry Drying Rack for Campervans, Caravans and Motorhomes

The Fiamma Easy Dry Carry-Bike Airer is a versatile accessory ideal for motorhomes, campervans and caravans with installed Fiamma carry-bike racks. It is designed to function as a drying rack for laundry and clothing, making it a camping essential for adventurers who love a bike ride. It is designed to fit on to the rail supports of Fiamma Carry Bikes, but will fit on most cycle carriers / bike racks.

Compatible with Fiamma Carry Bike models, suitable to leave on while travelling, no need to take off to add bikes to your bike rack, perfect for motorhome owners with mountain bikes. It acts as a drying rack for clothes and laundry items, handy to have when travelling on the road. The Fiamma Easy Dry is a supplementary product to the Fiamma bike rack. Not suitable for Carry Bikes with off-set rails (twin rear doors). Please ensure your current carrier is compatible with the Fiamma Easy Dry.

The Fiamma Easy Dry is equipped with easy installation capabilities, perfect for camping enthusiasts with little time. The clever folding design allows users to keep it fixed to the bike carrier while travelling. There is no need to remove it when loading your bikes.

Fiamma Easy Dry Bike and Clothes Rack - Features

  • Quick and easy installation on the floor of folding rail support for all Bicycle Racks / Bike Carriers with a diameter of 35 mm
  • Drilling not necessary on transport bicycles / carry-bikes with a wheelbase of 60 to 80 cm. Ideal for campervans of all sizes
  • Comes equipped with adjustable nylon cords and handles for hanging clothes outside your motorhome
  • Adjustable length of between 100cm and 120cm
  • Made from 22mm anodised aluminium tube

Fiamma Easy Dry Bicycle and Clothing Rack - Specifications

  • Material: Resistant and light tube in Anodised Aluminium (22 mm in diameter)
  • Adjustable length: 100 -120 cm
  • SKU: 06306-01

Product Name: Adventurer (RND) Curved Frame Top Hung Hinged Campervan Window (Rounded Corners) - Black Blind
Product Description:
Adventurer (RND) Curved Radius Frame Top Hinged Campervan Windows with Rounded / Curved Edges - Black Blind

Black Aluminium Curved Frame Low Profile Campervan Window with Black Blinds, ideal for panel vans.

Introducing our new collection of Adventurer Curved Campervan Top Hung Windows, crafted to seamlessly blend with the contours of your van.

Curved frame explained

Many panel van conversions and campervans have sides which have a slight curve running top to bottom, the Adventurer curved frame window matches the curve of your van's bodyshell. 

Practical and Stylish

These windows feature a sleek aluminium frame and are fitted with high-quality, dark tinted double glazed UV resistant acrylic, ensuring both durability and optimal protection against harmful UV rays and privacy. Available in various sizes, our curved campervan windows cater to your needs.  The Adventurer curved campervan windows prioritise stability and durability by incorporating an aluminium frame and stainless steel strut rods (with the exception of the 818 x 315mm version which comes with plastic struts). These enhanced features ensure a robust structure and reliable performance for your campervan adventures.

Privacy is key

With a dark tinted double glazed window and pleated blind and flyscreen within a PVC frame, the Adventurer Curved Frame low profile window adds privacy and helps to keep light out. The flyscreen also helps to provide airflow yet keep bugs out.

Easy installation

A window mounting frame which follows the curvature of your campervan van conversion sides with a maximum wall thickness of 26-50mm makes for easy installation on most vehicles and a wide range of window sizes in a stylish black colour will compliment most colour schemes well. It is suggested that a timber frame is bonded to the inside of the vehicle to add rigidity to the van's sides. The timber fame can be built up from thinner strips of ply to follow the curve of the campervans sides.

Adventurer Curved Top Hung Hinged Windows Specifications

  • Aluminium alloy flat frame finished in black
  • Thermal insulation
  • Double glazed acrylic window
  • Choose between black or white internal frame and blind
  • UV resistant
  • Curvature radius of 5000mm
  • Adjustable window stays
  • Handle without lock
  • Pleated blind with an Aluminium frame
  • Wall thickness mounting size: 26-50mm frame
  • Suitable for caravan motorhome or campervan

Product Description:
WHALE Watermaster On Board Pump 8 Litres

The WHALE Universal Freshwater Pump 8 Litres, also known as the Watermaster On Board Pump, is a reliable and efficient freshwater Pump perfect for use in caravan or motorhome. It delivers a smooth and consistent flow, even when demand fluctuates, and can run dry without damage.

WHALE Features:

  • Lightweight Design: 20% lighter than the WHALE Smartflo (now obsolete), the Whale Watermaster On Board Pump 8 Litres is only 1.48kg
  • Vertical Mounting: Saves space allowing the WHALE Watermaster On Board Pump to fit into tighter spaces in your caravan or motorhome
  • Quick Connect Ports: 12mm quick connect ports for fast and easy connections
  • Reduced Vibration: Rubber feet absorb vibration for quieter operation
  • Motor Protection: Fully sealed protective motor cover keeps moisture and dust out
  • Direct Replacement: Direct replacement for the WHALE UV0814 (equivalent to WHALE Smartflo)

Product Name: Dometic Freshjet FJX4 1500 Motorhome Caravan Air Conditioner *** OLD LISTING ***
Product Description:
Dometic FreshJet FJX4 1500 Motorhome Caravan Air Conditioner

Effective and Consistent Caravan / Campervan Air Conditioning with a Low-Key Design

Manage the temperature on your next caravaning adventure with the Freshjet FJX4 1500 Air Conditioner, an inexpensive, yet efficient Air Conditioner produced by Dometic. This Air Conditioning Unit is the entry-level model from the Dometic FreshJet product range and is compatable with small and medium sized motorhomes or caravans. It can quickly cool your motorhome / caravan in hot temperatures thanks to it's two-way air distribution system, which also helps to dehumidify the air and filter out dust particles. The Air Conditioning unit is a roof unit, so has to be fitted to the rooftop of the caravan / motorhome. The design is sleek, elegant and minimalistic, suiting any modern camper seamlessly and creating a feeling of luxury without losing any functionality.

Clean and Quality Airflow Distribution

The Dometic FreshJet FJX4 1500 Air Conditioner comes fitted with the new mechanical air distribution box, which is a light-weight and ultra-compact roof air con unit. It is ideal for recreational vehicles with insulated walls up to 5 metres in length. The new mechanical design is also elegantly designed to blend in with modern motorhome designs. It moves air in two directions, both front and back, and you can easily adjust the angle of the outlet fans, making it a versatile and modern Air Conditioner. The dust filter and optimised air distribution unit ensures for consistent, quiet, and clean air circulation within the caravan or motorhome.

Please note: The Dometic FreshJet FJX ADBM Control Panel is sold separately

Dometic Freshjet  FJX4 1500 Motorhome Roof Air Conditioner - Features:

  • The entry-level motorhome air conditioner in the Dometic range. Perfect for small and medium sized motorhomes
  • Cooling and Heating Functionality
  • Three operating modes: off, cooling and ventilation
  • Remote control included as standard
  • Optimised Airflow. New quiet air distribution box with powerful front and back airflow
  • Low-key and compact design makes the Air conditioner a stealthy upgrade to your campervan or motorhome
  • Re-usable dust filter, easy to clean and ensures air quality
  • Exclusive premium design - aerodynamically shaped rooftop with eye catching LED light curve 
  • Durable and robust design

Dometic FreshJet FJX4 1500M Caravan & Motorhome Air Conditioner - Specifications:

  • Best suited for caravans, campervans or motorhomes with insulated walls up to 5 metres in length
  • Roof installation in recreational caravans, campervans and motorhomes only
  • Can be retro-fitted as a replacement for an existing 400 x 400 roof vent or roof cut-out. Please check compatibility before retro-fitting, key factors to consider include: roof vent location and roof space
  • Cooling Capacity: 1500 Watts
  • Available in either black (sku: 9600050998) or white (sku: 9600050999)
  • Please note that when ordering the black version, the interior will be white, and only the roof top box will be in black.
  • External Dimensions (W x H x D mm): 702 x 225 x 752
  • Internal ADB Dimensions (W x H x D mm): 518 x 59 x 579
  • This product must be installed by a Dometic approved installer, to not do so will affect the warranty on the product.

Product Name: Fiamma Spare - Knuckle Leg Top For F45
Product Description:
Fiamma Spare - Knuckle Leg Top For F45

Fiamma Spare - Knuckle Leg Top For F45:

The Fiamma Spare - Knuckle Leg Top For F45 is a replacement part for the leg of Fiamma F45 awnings.
If the existing knuckle leg top on your F45 awning is broken, damaged, or missing, replacing it with this part will restore functionality and ensure the leg connects properly to the awning body.

Fits the following Fiamma awnings:

  •     F45 Ti awnings 190-450 length
  •     F1 TI awnings 250-400 length
  •     F45 I awnings 250-400 length
  •     F45 Plus awnings 250-400 length
  •     Fiamma F50 Pro 250-350 length
  •     Fiamma F45 Ti ZIP awnings 250-350 length


Fiamma Spare - Knuckle Leg Does NOT Fit:

  •     Fiamma F45 S awning
  •     Fiamma F45 L, Ti L or i L awnings
  •     F65 awnings

This part has been replaced by the 98655-757. Please be aware the design and look are different however they are still compatible.

Product Name: Standard Universal Conversion Kit for Hob and Sink Combinations
Product Description:
Standard Universal Conversion Kit for Hob and Sink Combination Units

Get your campervan conversion rolling! This universal kit provides everything you need for gas and water in your hob and sink. It works with combination units (Dometic 9222, etc.) or separate hob and sink setups. The kit includes copper pipe, LPG hose, compression fittings, a microswitched cold water kit, submersible pump, jerrycans, and appropriate piping for hassle-free installation.

Uni Kit Includes:

  • Folding Micro-Switched Cold Tap
  • Whale Submersible Pump
  • 2 x 10L Jerry Cans (Dimensions - L28cm x W13cm x H34cm)
  • 2mtr x 10mm Cold Pipe
  • 2mtr x 20mm Waste Pipe
  • 75mm Floor Vent
  • Pack of x 8 P-Clips
  • 4 x Jubilee Clips
  • 3 metres of 12 volt twin core cable
  • 1 x 8mm Straight Compression Coupling
  • 1x 8mm Compression Nozzle
  • 1mtr LPG Gas Hose
  • 2mtr x 8mm Copper Pipe
  • Cable connectors

Product Name: Vango Soul 200 2 Person Tent - Deep Blue
Product Description:
Vango Soul 200 2-Person Tent

Adventure Awaits: Lightweight Tent for Weekend Camping Adventures

The Vango Soul is the ideal starter camping tent for exploration and little adventures. The Vango Soul 200 sleeps 2 people or solo campers looking for additional space. It's classic tunnel design and two poled structure means it can be pitched quickly and effectively, in under seven minutes! The fast pack tent design of tent makes it easy to disassemble and pack away. The Vango Soul 200 tent is perfect for those who crave adventure but also want to minimise pitch time and maximise time spend in the great outdoors. A low-cost, entry-level tent perfect for backpacking, bike-packing and weekend camping trips.

 

There are vents on the flysheet and a mesh panel on the inner door which allow air to flow freely through the tent, helping to keep the inner tent cool and reduce condensation. In addition, the Vango Soul include storage pockets, lantern hanging loops, and reflective guy lines.

 

Vango Soul 200 Camping Tent Features:

  • Quick and easy to pitch
  • Made from lightweight materials that are reliable, strong and durable
  • Fire retardant material meets and exceeds European EN5912 safety standard
  • High visibility guylines make tent easy to see in low light conditions
  • Made with breathable polyester inner for increased airflow
  • Highly waterproof, up to 3000mm HH
  • Part mesh inner door to allow ventilation and keeps bugs out
  • Fully weather tested to the European Standard EN ISO 5912 by a certified safety test centre
  • Oversized pack bag for easy packing, with compression straps for additional adjustment

Product Name: Remis REMIfront Windscreen Blind - Fiat Ducato 2021 onwards
Product Description:
Remis REMIfront IV Windscreen Blind Blackout - Fiat Ducato 2021 onwards

Outdoors in comfort: REMIFront Blackout Blinds for Ducato Campervans

The Remis window blackout blinds are designed and produced to keep sunlight from entering your Fiat Ducato campervan and provide an extra element of privacy when on the road. This part of the blackout system is designed to fit on to the windscreen of the campervan and comes pre-assembled. It is designed to be easy to install and easy to use, with a drawing mechanic moving from left to right and an integrated magnetic catch / latch. This helps to prevent cracks of sunlight peering through your campervan in the early hours of the morning! However, the pleated material and construction of the blinds allows you to effortlessly customise the level of light going into the Transit campervan.

Please Note: This product is not designed to provide additional protection against external elements, however, will provide an element of cooling due to the sun blocking features of the Blackout system. Additionally, they are not suitable for Ford Custom models. Remis Blackout System / Blinds are not suitable for vehicles with active airbags within the A pillars or above doors, or for a Transit fitted with a mounted sensor.

Please Note: We are unable to ship Remis blinds to Northern Ireland

Remis REMIFront - Features

  • Pre-assembled and easy to install
  • Magnetic catch for a secure draw
  • Carefully placed ventilation openings
  • Lightweight pleated finish
  • Fold away in a tidy manner to avoid obstruction when driving
  • Discreet when not in use
  • Easy to install

Remis REMIFront - Specifications

  • Intended for usage with the Fiat Ducato Campervan from 2021 onwards, not yet suitable for the Citroen Relay or Peugeot Boxer.

Product Name: Brunner Wise A.I.R. TECH Campervan Driveaway Awning
Product Description:
Brunner Wise A.I.R. TECH Campervan Driveaway Awning

The Brunner Wise A.I.R Tech Campervan driveaway awning allows for endless innovation. Capable of adapting to any weather with its four removable walls, three different wall elements, two tunnel system and fully sewn in tent floor, the Brunner Wise A.I.R Tech can protect your from any sort of terrain.

Amazing Versatility 

The efficient Oneflate inflation system is great for tackling them unexpected storms due to its quick setup. Fitted with weather fighter 300D Polyester and A.I.R tech frame this free standing driveway awning can combat various harsh conditions keeping you safe and secure from wind, rain and insects. Adaptability is a crucial element of the Brunner Wise A.I.R Tech driveaway awning as the two tunnel system accommodates different campervan heights.

Features and Specifications

  • Select between two connection tunnel sizes: 190cm - 220cm and 220cm - 250cm.
  • Large storage space with extra large carry bag with compression straps.
  • Variety of design options with all four walls having the ability to be removed and used as a veranda, in addition to the ability to to open the back door half way.
  • Variety with the ability swap each wall element based on weather conditions. These elements include gauze window, tinted film and blackout.
  • Sturdy and secure with a fully sewn-in ground sheet, using tent tensioning and having lockable accessibility through the rear wall.
  • Front wall entrance access.
  • High quality accessories including air pump, pressure relief valve and hooks and Velcro elements for attaching lamps. 
  • Multiple connection options including connection pole, sewn-on-straps with clips for roof rails, guy lines for tensioning across the rood and keder beading which is 5 to 7mm.

Product Name: Victron Energy Blue Power MultiPlus-II GX 48V Battery Inverter Charger
Product Description:
Victron Energy MultiPlus-II GX 48 Volt Inverter Charger 230V

The Victron MultiPlus-II GX 48 combines the advanced functionality of the MultiPlus, and the grid-optimization features of the MultiGrid to create a fantastic all-in-one powerhouse perfect for powering your off-grid and grid-connected systems, making it perfect for yachting & camping. Similar to the MultiPlus-II 48, the MultiPlus-II GX has functionalities including an external transformer which brings functions such as PowerControl and PowerAssist. The Victron Energy MultiPlus-II GX is an advanced inverter/charger that comes in two different models (3000 & 5000) to best suit your power needs.

The MultiPlus-II GX is designed to power your systems remotely, off-grid and grid-connected systems. The GX combines the functionality of its powerful inverter and sophisticated battery charger in a single unit. This inverter/charger not only optimizes battery charging and delivers clean AC power, but also hosts a built-in GX device with remote monitoring capabilities, an additional feature that separates the GX from other Victron Energy models. The MultiPlus-II GX comes with device networking built-in. The MultiPlus communicates with a solar charger, batteries, and other devices to control its power installation remotely, off-grid, or in a grid-connected power supply. An amazing feature of the GX is that you can control and access your system directly from your phone, from anywhere in the world.

There are many benefits to purchasing the MultiPlus-II GX, because of its advanced features like PowerAssist and its built-in GX device for remote monitoring. Find out more about the key features of the MultiPlus GX below!

Key Features:

  • Integrated GX Device: The MultiPlus-II GX features a built-in GX device with a display and Wi-Fi connectivity. This allows you to monitor battery, inverter, and solar charger parameters directly on the unit or remotely via your smartphone or other Wi-Fi enabled device.
    • The integrated GX device includes: A BMS-Can interface. This can be used to connect to a compatible CAN-bus managed battery. Note that this is not a VE.Can compatible port.
    • A USB port.
    • An Ethernet port.
    • A VE.Direct port.
  • Unique PowerAssist Feature: The MultiPlus-II GX will prevent overload of limited AC sources (generators, shore power) by managing your power in two stages. First, it prioritizes supplying your essential appliances by automatically reducing battery charging current if the AC source nears its limit. Secondly, if you need a temporary power surge, PowerAssist can tap into your battery bank to supplement the AC input, ensuring your appliances receive the extra boost without overloading the generator.
  • Advanced System Management: Control your entire power system with ease. Set load limits, prioritize AC sources, and leverage PowerAssist technology to prevent overload and optimize power usage.
  • Uninterrupted AC Power (UPS): Experience seamless power transition in the case of grid failure, or when shore or generator power is disconnected. The built-in inverter automatically takes over within milliseconds, ensuring your critical appliances continue to operate without disruption.
  • Scalable Power: Need more power? The MultiPlus-II GX can be configured for parallel operation to increase power output or battery charging rates. It can also be set up for three-phase supply.
  • Remote Monitoring and Control: The MultiPlus GX allows you to gain full control of your system your system, no matter your location. You can monitor and control your MultiPlus-II GX remotely from anywhere in the world via the free VRM app and web portal. Access can be on phone, laptop, table, or PC.

Product Name: AG Window Frame for VW T5 T6 and Volkswagen T6.1 Campervan
Option Set: AG Window Frame for VW T5, T6 & T6.1
Product Description:
AG Window Frame for VW T5, T6 & T6.1

Transform your Volkswagen T5, T6, or T6.1 into the ultimate campervan with our selection of high-quality AG Window Frames! We offer a wide range of models designed to seamlessly integrate with your specific van configuration, ensuring a professional and finished look. Models include; Tailgate, Offside Sliding Door, Offside Rear SWL, Offside Rear LWB, Nearside Sliding Door, Nearside Rear SWB, Nearside LWB & Barn Door window frames. Get the perfect part you want, perfect for campervan conversions and easy-to-install.  All AG Window Frames are crafted from high-quality black material and are supplied without glass, allowing you to customize the windowpanes according to your preferences and local regulations.

Trying to find the exact window frame you need? Whether it's for the tailgate, sliding door (UK offside or nearside), rear quarters (SWB or LWB), or even barn doors. We've got you covered! Each AG Window Frame is meticulously crafted to perfectly match the contours of your VW's panels, both inside and out. This ensures a clean, OEM-style look and eliminates the need for complicated modifications. Our frames provide a neat and polished finish, enhancing the overall aesthetic of your campervan conversion, so say goodbye to unsightly carpet cuts and exposed edges! The robust design of AG Window Frames protects your hands from any sharp metal edges, promoting a safer environment inside your van. Installation couldn't be easier! These window frames come ready to be secured directly to your van using screws (included). No special tools or expertise required.

Tailgate

An easy-to-fit black window frame for the rear tailgate door on Volkswagen T5, T6 and T6.1 campervan conversions. Please note, this product is a window frame only and is not supplied with glass. This frame sits perfectly inside the panel on the inside of the van, hiding any discrepancies in carpet cut and protects hands from rough edges. It is easily secured directly to the van with screws. Ideal for VW DIY van conversions and campers.

Offside Sliding Door

A black window frame designed to fit the UK offside sliding door on short or long wheel-based Volkswagen T5, T6 and VWT6.1 campervan conversions. This frame sits perfectly inside the panel on the inside of the van, hiding any discrepancies in carpet cut and protects hands from rough edges. It is easily secured directly to the van with screws. Compatible with VW Transporter and suitable for DIY camper conversions.

Offside Rear Quarter SWL

A two-piece black window frame that fits easily to the interior and exterior offside window in Volkswagen T5, T6 and T6.1 campervan conversions with short wheelbases (4.9 metres long). This frame sits perfectly inside the panel on the inside of the van, hiding any discrepancies in carpet cut and protects hands from rough edges. It is easily secured directly to the van with screws. Designed for Volkswagen Transporter and suitable for self build camper conversions.

Offside Rear Quarter LWB

A black window frame that fits easily to the interior and exterior offside window of Volkswagen T5, T6 and T6.1 campervan conversions with long wheelbases (5.3 metres long). This frame sits perfectly inside the panel on the inside of the van, hiding any discrepancies in carpet cut and protects hands from rough edges. It is easily secured directly to the van with screws. Ideal for VW Transporter DIY camper van conversions.

Nearside Sliding Door

A black window frame designed to fit the UK passenger side (nearside) sliding door on short or long wheel-based Volkswagen T5, T6 and VWT6.1 campervan conversions. This frame sits perfectly inside the panel on the inside of the van, hiding any discrepancies in carpet cut and protects hands from rough edges. It is easily secured directly to the van with screws.

Nearside Rear Quarter SWB

An easy-to-fit black window frame for the nearside rear quarter SWB on Volkswagen T5, T6 and T6.1 campervan conversions, hiding any discrepancies in carpet cut and protects from rough edges.

Nearside Rear Quarter LWB 

An easy-to-fit black window frame for the rear nearside quarter LWB on Volkswagen T5, T6 and T6.1 campervan conversions, hiding any discrepancies in carpet cut and protects from rough edges.

Barn Door

An easy-to-fit black window frame for the Barn Door (both doors) on Volkswagen T5, T6 and T6.1 campervan conversions, hiding any discrepancies in carpet cut and protects from rough edges.

****Please note, these products are window frames only and are not supplied with glass.****

Product Name: REMIS Remitop Vario II 400 x 400 Motorhome Rooflight with Hand Crank
Product Description:
REMIS REMItop Vario II (400 x 400mm) Motorhome Rooflight with Hand Crank

The Remis REMItop Vario 2 Campervan and Motorhome Rooflight is a high-quality, versatile skylight designed to enhance your motorhome or campervan. Suitable for all standard Campervan and Motorhome with a roof thickness between 24mm and 35mm (fixing kit included), the Remis Vario 2 skylight is built with lightweight but durable materials ensuring worry-free travels no matter where you go. 

The Remis Vario 2's sleek aerodynamic design and innovative features provide optimal ventilation, natural light, and a panoramic view. With a simple, smooth-crank handle, you can easily open the rooflight to any angle up to 60 degrees. The integrated blackout blind and insect screen ensure comfort and protection, day and night. For warmer weather the Remis Vario 2's tinted dome reduces glare through the skylight and also minimise unnecessary heat gain inside your Motorhome or Campervan.

Please Note: We are unable to ship Remis blinds to Northern Ireland

Key Features:

  • Lightweight Design: The lightest rooflight in its class, reducing vehicle weight.
  • Large Opening Angle: Up to 60 degrees for maximum ventilation and views.
  • Easy Operation: Smooth-crank handle for effortless opening and closing.
  • Integrated Features: Blackout blind and insect screen for optimal comfort.
  • Durable Construction: High-quality materials and robust design for long-lasting performance.
  • Tinted Dome: Reduces glare and heat gain.

 Specifications:

  • Rooflight/Skylight Size (Width x Height in mm): 400 x 400
  • Roof Thickness: 24 - 35mm (fixing kit included)
  • Opening angle: Up to 60°
  • Frame Colour: Light Beige
  • Blind Colour: White
Product Availability: Delivery 3 - 5 working days

Product Name: Dometic - Deluxe Rear Upright Caravan Pole Set
Product Description:
Dometic Deluxe Rear Upright Pole Set

Aluminium Rear Upright Pole Set for Caravans:

The Dometic Deluxe Rear Upright Pole Set is a pair of lightweight aluminium poles designed to improve the stability, weatherproofing and reduce wind noise of your caravan porch awning. the caravan rear pole set features a telescopic design with a twist-lock mechanism. It allows for easy adjustment even in wet or windy conditions and has flattened ends with protective covers to fit into the pocket of the awning.

Dometic Upright Pole Set Features:

  • Telescopic design to adjust the height.
  • Twist lock mechanism to secure positioning.
  • Flattened ends with protective covers.
  • Plastic spiked pole foot.

Product Name: Horrex DuoPliss UCS Window Blind & Flyscreen
Product Description:
Horrex DuoPliss Window Blind

Cassette blind and fly screen for caravan and motorhome

The Horrex DuoPliss Window Blind, also known as the Horrex UCS blind, is a durable window blind designed specifically to work with Polyvision caravan and motorhome windows. The Horrex DuoPliss Blind is easy to use and combines a pleated insect screen and sun blinds in one unit. Available in white or cream.

The Horrex DuoPliss Blind Features:

  • Double Functionality: Combining pleated insect screen and sunblind in one unit.
  • Durability: The blind is made from lightweight and durable material that is resistant to fading, discoloration, and heat.
  • Easy to use: Operating with a cord or wand for smooth and silent opening and closing.
  • Versatility: The UCS version is specially designed to be resizable by cutting it down to any size window within the range of 15 pre-made sizes offered.

This is a special order product. Customers are advised to carefully measure their existing windows before purchasing
