Vamoose Awning Combi Rail For SWB VW T4 - T5 and T6 Campervans
Product Description:
Vamoose Awning Combi Rail For SWB VW T4 - T5 and T6 Campervans

Looking to upgrade your VW camper van (T4, T5, T5.1 and T6)? Vamoose Volkswagen Campervan Rails are a must-have! This dual-purpose camper van rail acts as a rain gutter to keep your van dry when accessing the sliding door. Plus, it features a built-in track for attaching most freestanding awnings. The design allows for clearance with pop-top roofs and roof racks in most cases.
Installation is simple with the included kit and instructions. The Vamoose VW T5 T6 rails are made from high-quality, black anodized aluminium for a great fit and come with strong adhesive and stainless-steel fixings for secure mounting. Special brackets (sold separately) allow compatibility with Fiamma or Thule awnings for additional shade. Whether you're looking for rain protection, an awning solution, or both, Vamoose Combi Rails offer a functional and stylish upgrade for your VW camper van.

Vamoose VW T5 T6 Awning Rail Spec:

•    Rain Gutter:  The VW T5 T6 rail acts as a gutter, preventing water from dripping into your van when you open the sliding door. This is especially helpful on those rainy days.
•    Awning and Accessory Rail: The Vamoose VW T4 T5 T6 rail features a built-in 6mm Kedar C section. This allows you to attach a wide range of awnings and accessories that use this common fitting method, including:

-    Freestanding drive-away awnings
-    Fiamma or Thule wind-out awnings (with additional brackets)
-    Other accessories using the 6mm Kedar section
-    260cm in length

Key Features:

•    Designed for the nearside & Offside of UK vehicles.
•    Easy to install with all parts and instructions included.
•    Vamoose camper rails are made in the UK with black anodized malleable aluminium for a great fit on curved surfaces.
•    Secured with strong adhesive and stainless-steel fixings.

Custom features:

•    Front rubberized profile for better vehicle contour fit.
•    Heavy-duty rear finial for smooth awning strip insertion.
Product Availability: In stock & sent on a next working day carrier!

Product Name: Vamoose Awning Combi Rail For LWB VW T4 - T5 and T6 Campervans
Product Description:
Vamoose Awning Combi Rail For LWB VW T4 - T5 and T6 Campervans

Vamoose combi rails are a great new addition to any campervan. The dual-purpose combi rail acts as a rain gutter to prevent rain from entering your campervan when you open the sliding door and has a 6mm Kedar C section in built to the rail, allowing you connect most free standing drive away awnings, as well as many other accessories that use the 6mm Kedar section. It fits between the top of the sliding door and roof, so on most installations it doesn’t stop you from using pop top roofs or roof racks.

Also, the addition of the special custom made brackets allows a wind out canopy such as a Fiamma or Thule awning to be connected to your VW T5 T6 campervan. There is a custom designed front rubberised profile to follow the contours of most campervans and a heavy duty rear finial that fits well and makes inserting the awning strip without catching or dragging less difficult.

Vamoose VW T5 T6 LWB Awning Rail Spec:

•    Rain Gutter:  The VW T5 T6 LWB rail acts as a gutter, preventing water from dripping into your van when you open the sliding door. This is especially helpful on those rainy days.
•    Awning and Accessory Rail: The Vamoose VW T4 T5 T6 rail features a built-in 6mm Kedar C section. This allows you to attach a wide range of awnings and accessories that use this common fitting method, including:

-    Freestanding drive-away awnings
-    Fiamma or Thule wind-out awnings (with additional brackets)
-    Other accessories using the 6mm Kedar section
-    300cm in length

Key Features:

•    Designed for the nearside & Offside of UK vehicles.
•    Easy to install with all parts and instructions included.
•    Vamoose camper rails are made in the UK with black anodized malleable aluminium for a great fit on curved surfaces.
•    Secured with strong adhesive and stainless-steel fixings.

Custom features:

•    Heavy-duty rear finial for smooth awning strip insertion.

Product Name: Vamoose Awning Combi Rail For MWB VW Crafter/Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Campervans
Product Description:
Vamoose Awning Combi Rail For MWB VW Crafter/Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Caravans

If you are looking for a versatile addition to your VW Crafter or Mercedes-Benz Sprinter campervan, then you should look no further than Vamoose Combi Rails!
These Vamoose awning rails serve two purposes: acting as a rain gutter to prevent water from entering your campervan when you open the sliding door, as well as having a built-in 6mm Kedar C section that allows you to attach most awnings or accessories that use this standard size to your VW Crafter or Mercedes-Benz Sprinter campervan, including freestanding awnings and wind-out canopies from Fiamma or Thule. Also, rails fit neatly between the top of your sliding door and roof, ensuring compatibility with most pop-top roofs and roof racks.

Vamoose VW Crafter/Mercedes-Benz Sprinter Awning Rail Spec:

-    Freestanding drive-away awnings
-    Fiamma or Thule wind-out awnings (with additional brackets)
-    Other accessories using the 6mm Kedar section
-    2950mm in length

Key Features:

•    Designed for the nearside & Offside of UK vehicles.
•    Easy to install with all parts and instructions included.
•    Vamoose camper rails are made in the UK with black anodized malleable aluminium for a great fit on curved surfaces.
•    Secured with strong adhesive and stainless-steel fixings.

Custom features:

•    Front rubberized profile for better vehicle contour fit.
•    Heavy-duty rear finial for smooth awning strip insertion.
Product Availability: # Delivery 3 to 4 working days!

Stronghold Hitchlock for Caravan and Trailer AL-KO Hitches 5412
Product Description:
Stronghold Hitchlock for Caravan and Trailer AL-KO Hitches (5412)

The Stronghold SH5412 has Sold Secure Gold standard for caravans and trailers, offering peace of mind wherever you park. It's also VbV/SCM MP03 approved in the Netherlands. the Stronghold SH5412 Hitchlock is easy to install in under 10 seconds, whether your caravan is hitched or unhitched. The robust yellow steel casing deters would-be thieves, while the unique high-security locking system with thousands of key combinations provides unbeatable protection. Three keys are included, along with a key identity tag for easy replacement.

As well as that, the Stronghold SH5412 Hitchlock is built to withstand the elements, being waterproof and corrosion-proof. It also comes with a storage bag for added convenience and finally, the box includes everything you need: a hitchlock cover, locking bolt body, locking bolt lock holder with three keys, a security ball, fitting instructions, a warranty card, spare parts, and a breakdown of additional spares available for purchase.

Protect your caravan from theft with the SH5412 Stronghold Hitchlock. It is ideal for caravan storage, both at home and at storage facilities, and specially designed for a wide range of ALKO models, including:

  • AK130
  • AK160
  • AKS1300
  • AKS2004
  • AKS3004

Stronghold Hitchlock Features:

  • Approved to Sold Secure Gold standard for caravan and trailers
  • VbV/SCM MP03 approved in the Netherlands
  • Weighing only 3Kg it is easily fitted, hitched or unhitched
  • Provides security for a car and caravan when they are parked coupled together e.g. motorway services (note – for safety reasons this product is not recommended for use while towing)
  • Fitment in under 10 seconds
  • Lightweight and user friendly touring or storage product
  • The robust yellow anti-saw steel casing covers the fixing bolts of the hitch to protect it from being stolen
  • Unique high security patented locking system
  • High security pick-free locks have thousands of possible key combinations and are supplied with 3 keys, plus a key identity tag
  • Water and corrosion proof
  • Storage bag included
  • Recommended security for caravan storage (at home or at storage facility)
Product Warranty: The Stronghold SH5412 comes with a 1 year warranty.
Product Availability: # Delivery 4 to 5 working days!

Product Description:
Stronghold Hitchlock for Avonride 50mm Trailer

Ultimate Trailer Security with Stronghold Hitchlock

The Stronghold Hitchlock for Avonride 50mm Trailer is an essential security solution for protecting your trailer, designed specifically to fit Avonride 50mm cast coupling heads. This hitchlock is compatible with models ranging from 1400Kg to 3500Kg, including 575003, 575004, 575005, and 575008. It combines a high-security, patented locking system with a durable, visible design that is easy to install and provides maximum peace of mind, whether your trailer is parked or in transit. Built to meet the Sold Secure Gold Standard, this hitchlock offers robust, pick-free protection with thousands of possible key combinations, all in a compact, lightweight format that is water and corrosion resistant for long-lasting performance.

Key Features:

  • Sold Secure Gold Standard: Approved to the highest standard for trailers, ensuring top-tier security.
  • High Security Patented Locking System: Features a unique, patented design with high security pick-free locks. Thousands of possible key combinations provide robust protection.
  • Lightweight and Compact: Weighing only 4.5Kg, this hitchlock is easy to fit, whether the trailer is hitched or unhitched, with installation taking under 10 seconds.
  • High Visibility and Durability: The strong yellow steel casing is not only visible but also features anti-saw properties to cover and protect the hitch’s fixing bolts.
  • Water and Corrosion Resistant: Built to withstand the elements, ensuring long-lasting performance.
  • Versatile Use: Suitable for many Ifor Williams trailers, horseboxes, and Nugent trailers, and allows the use of the Avonride integral lock.
  • Certified and Approved: Besides the Sold Secure Gold standard, it is VbV/SCM MP03 approved in the Netherlands and Secured by Design approved in the UK.

What’s in the Box:

  • Hitchlock cover
  • Locking bolt body
  • Locking bolt lock holder with three keys and a key identity tag
  • High security plastic hitch ball
  • Fitting instructions and warranty card

Specifications:

  • Brand: Maypole
  • Model: Stronghold SH5415 Hitchlock for Avonride Hitches
  • Dimensions: 12.8 x 12.8 x 19.3 cm
  • Weight: 4.5 kg
  • Manufacturer Part Number: SH5415
Product Warranty: The Stronghold Hitchlock comes with a 1 year warranty
Product Availability: # Delivery 4 to 5 working days!

Product Name: Easy Camp Wimberly Drive-Away Campervan Awning
Product Description:
Easy Camp Wimberly Drive-Away Campervan Awning

The Easy Camp Wimberly drive away awning is a large tunnel type drive-away awning. It features a detachable bathtub groundsheet and pre-angled fibreglass poles. With full standing headroom, curtained windows, a rear double and front door, as well as large air vents, the Easy Camp Wimberly drive away awning has enough space to fit a two-person optional inner tent on either side. The front door is protected by a canopy and the awning is quick and easy to attach to your campervan.

Easy Camp Wimberly Drive-away Awning Features:

  • Flysheet: WeatherGuard 3000, 185T polyester PU coated, fire retardant
  • Taping: Taped seams
  • Hydrostatic Head: 3000 mm
  • Roof connection length: 240 cm
  • Attachment height: 180 - 205 cm
  • Bead thickness: 7 mm
  • Poles: EnduraFlex, fibreglass 12.7 mm / 9.5 mm
  • Groundsheet: Double-coated waterproof polyethylene

Awning Specification:

  • Colour: Grey
  • Material: Fly: 100% Polyester Mesh: 100% Polyester
  • Pack size: 72 x 25 cm
  • Weight: 11.2 kg

Product Description:
CBE Digital Panel with OLED Display - PT732

Touch Screen Campervan Digital Panel

The PT732 Digital Panel is a high-end touch screen display OLED display designed for CBE's Solar System. It provides a clear and easy way to test your solar power setup. The PT732 Digital Panel with OLED display is a comprehensive and user-friendly solution for testing two 12V batteries in your CBE solar system. This simple battery monitor lets you ensure you don't damage your battery by over discharging. You can also use voltage as an indication of how much charge is left in the battery. This OLED Display Panel is ideal for your motorhome, caravan, camper van, boat and many more recreational leisure vehicles!

 

Keep track of your battery charge level wherever you go. The CBE PT732 gives you simple and reliable monitoring of leisure battery voltage. This control panel can report the voltage of one or two batteries via the LCD display, giving you a clear readout. Compatible with CBE's PRS300, PBS90, and PRM350 regulators, the PT732 allows effortless navigation and control through its touch screen interface.  The display brightness adjusts for optimal viewing in any lighting condition, and the panel can be mounted flush or on a wall using the included spacer.  This digital control panel integrates seamlessly with CBE's "Modular Plates" and "Modular Plates Berker" systems. With a 12V power supply, 60 x 60 mm dimensions, and anthracite grey finish, the PT732 Digital Panel is a comprehensive and user-friendly solution for checking the voltage of two batteries in your CBE solar power system.

 

Digital Panel Key Features:

  • Monitor key metrics: The PT732 displays essential information of battery voltage from your solar regulator.
  • Compatible regulators: This digital panel works seamlessly with CBE's PRS300, PBS90, and PRM350 solar charge regulators.
  • Easy to use: The touch screen interface makes it simple to navigate and access information.
  • Adjustable brightness: Adjust the display brightness for optimal viewing in any lighting condition.
  • Mounting options: Mount the PT732 flush or on a wall using the included spacer. It also integrates with CBE's "Modular Plates" and "Modular Plates Berker" for a clean and organized look.

Compatible with CBE Regulators:

  • PRS300
  • PBS90
  • PRM350
  • PRS350 (depending on the model)

User Manual:

Product Name: Outwell Hillcrest Campervan Sun Canopy Tarp
Product Description:
Outwell Hillcrest Tarp

Sun Canopy Shade for Campervans and Motorhomes

Expand your outdoor living space with an Outwell Hillcrest Tarp. This multi-functional campervan awning provides an easy way to add privacy, shade and wind protection to your campervan. Use it on the door side for interior privacy, roll up part of the tarp and secure it with toggles to provide shade while maintaining airflow or sturdy eyelets allow you to extend the tarp as a sun canopy with poles for even more coverage, . The Hillcrest Tarp can be combined with the Fallcrest Side Panel Set (sold separately) for a complete privacy and weather protection solution.

Quick and Easy Set Up

The handy Outwell Hillcrest Tarp is quickly and easily set up by sliding into the beading channel of a wind out awning or multirail. It's compact pack size fits inside the tailgate of a VW California and makes it the perfect space saving canopy for your camper.

Outwell Hillcrest Sun Canopy Specification:

  • UV Protection: UPF 30+
  • Hydrostatic Head: 3000 mm
  • Roof connection length: 230 cm
  • Attachment height: 155 - 300 cm
  • Poles: Steel, 16 mm, 180 cm, 2 pcs
  • Pack size: 44 x 33 x 6 cm
  • Weight: 2.1 kg
  • Item number: 111403

Product Name: Vango Blaze Single and Double Camping Gas Cooker
Product Description:
Vango Blaze Gas Cooker

Single and Double Camping Stove

The Vango Blaze Gas Cooker is a portable camping stove that comes in two models: a single burner and a double burner. The Vango Blaze Gas Cooker is a great choice for camping, road-trips and travel since they are lightweight and compact. The Blaze Camping stove is made from stainless steel and features a 3 kW hi heat output allowing water to boil quickly and efficiently. These Vango gas cookers also have a low to the ground design with anti-slip feet for stability and grip. For safety they also come with a PVC hose with auto shut-off for safety.

Vango Blaze Gas Cooker Features:

  • 3 kW Hi heat.
  • Anti-slip feet
  • PVC hose
  • Compatible EN417 threaded self-sealing gas cartridges.

  • Dimensions: H8 x W22.5 x L20 cm

Outwell Windscreen Premium

Four Panel 6.5m Camping windbreak

The Outwell Windscreen Premium windbreak is a large stable camping windbreak designed to provide shelter and protection from moderate rain and wind and is perfect for for camping, road trips or beach adventures. The large 6.5m Outwell Windscreen Premium has four fabric sections with PVC sneak peek windows which allow you to keep an eye on the kids. This premium wind break is made of from Outwell's Outtex 3000 Select polyester, a tough, embossed fabric with a 3000mm hydrostatic head and comes with steel pegs, ground spikes and luminous guylines for secure placement within windy conditions.

Outwell's windscreen premium is supported by an easy to set up frame of 16mm spring-linked strong and durable steel poles.

  • 4 x lightweight sections

Product Description:
CTA - Bench Frame - FORWARD FACING - DOUBLE - Fiat Ducato

Product Description

Overview:

Introducing the CTA - Bench Frame - FORWARD FACING - DOUBLE for Fiat Ducato, a revolutionary product born from the collaboration of two industry leaders, CTA and TRUMA. This innovative solution is designed to optimize the warm air distribution in your motorhome while efficiently utilizing the available space. The CTA Bench Frame is a comprehensive smart kit featuring a forward-facing seat frame with pre-mounted safety belts for two seats, floor anchoring brackets, chassis fixing screws, and assembly instructions. Designed for optimal use of space, it maximizes motorhome efficiency by allowing the placement of the Truma Combi heater (sold separately) for ideal warm air distribution. Built to the highest standards, it ensures durability and safety for a reliable upgrade to your motorhome.

Upgrade your motorhome with the CTA - Bench Frame - FORWARD FACING - DOUBLE for Fiat Ducato and experience unparalleled comfort and efficiency.

Check out CTA's installation video here.

Product Description:
Dometic NRX 115 Compressor Caravan Fridge Freezer

NRX 115 Dometic 113L Fridge

Introducing the Dometic NRX 115, a smart compressor-cooled refrigerator that combines cutting-edge design with exceptional energy efficiency. This sleek appliance boasts 113 Litres of cool storage, perfectly complementing any caravan or mobile home interior. The dark silver front panel and frameless door, complete with a full-width handle, provide a sophisticated aesthetic and easy access from any angle.

The Dometic NRX series takes cooling efficiency to new heights. With more efficient compressors, optimized speed controls, and reinforced insulation, the NRX 115 delivers reliable cooling with superior energy savings. Whether you're deep-freezing or refrigerating, this versatile fridge freezer is your perfect companion on the road.

NRX 115 Features:

  • 3-in-1 Cooling Solution: Enjoy the flexibility of using the fridge as a refrigerator, a freezer, or both at the same time by easily removing the 8.2-liter freezer compartment.
  • Energy-Efficient Compressor: Featuring a high-end, lightweight, and compact compressor with three operating modes (Eco/Boost/Silent) for efficient cooling in all weather conditions.
  • Easy-to-Use Control Panel: Integrated flush-mounted control panel with an LED light bar for clear visibility.
  • Winter Mode: Smart closing mechanism allows for a gap between the fridge and door, ensuring proper air circulation during winter.
  • Bevelled Rear Side: Designed for maximum utilization of space on board, fitting seamlessly into your caravan setup.
  • Reversible Door Hinge: The door hinge can be fitted on the left or right as required, providing flexibility in installation.
  • Dual Function Locks: These locks can also act as vents, providing additional ventilation for your fridge.
  • Standard or Flush-Mount Installation: An installation frame is available as an accessory, allowing for either standard or flush-mount installation to suit your preferences.

Well-Equipped Interior:

  • Removable Freezer: The 8.2-liter freezer compartment can be effortlessly removed to maximize fridge storage space.
  • Comprehensive Storage Solutions: Includes shelves, a bottle holder, a door tray, and two crispers to store fruits and vegetables at optimal temperatures.

Premium Performance:

  • Top Energy Efficiency: Achieves top ratings with an energy consumption of only 0.48 kWh/24h, making it about 9% more efficient than its CRX predecessor.
  • Optimized Insulation: High-quality vacuum panels in the freezer compartment minimize energy loss, ensuring reliable cooling and superior efficiency.

Scope of Delivery:

  • 1 Refrigerator, 1 Drain Elbow, 1 SOM Manual, 1 INM Manual

Technical Specifications:

  • Model: NRX0115C
  • Total Volume: 113 Litres
  • Frozen Volume: 8.2 Litres
  • Overall Height :745mm
  • Overall Width: 525mm
  • Overall Depth: 568mm
  • Input Voltage: 12/24V DC
  • Rated Input Power: 70W
  • Refrigerant: R134a (40g, GWP: 1430, CO2 equivalent: 0.057t)
  • Net Weight: 26 kg
  • Climate Class: T
  • SKU: 9620001485
  • EAN-13: 7315091485975

Package Dimensions:

Ensure the ultimate security of your caravan or trailer with the Stronghold Hitchlock for Winterhoff WS300 Hitches. Quick to install, highly secure, and built to last, this hitchlock is a must-have for any caravan owner.

  • Versatile Use: Provides security for both hitched and unhitched situations, ideal for when a car and caravan are parked together.

Product Name: Stronghold Atlas Wheel Clamps for Caravans & Trailers
Product Description:
Stronghold Atlas Wheel Clamps for Caravans & Trailers

Secure your caravan or trailer with the Strongholds Atlas Wheel Clamp

Product Name: Maxview Omnimax Pro TV Aerial for Campervan & Motorhome
Product Description:
Maxview Omnimax Pro TV Aerial in White for Caravan and Motorhome

Stay Entertained, Anywhere

The Maxview Omnimax Pro TV Aerial is an omni directional antenna (receives signals from all directions) designed for use as a TV aerial in Campervans and Motorhomes, but can be used in Horseboxes, Canal boats and Narrowboats. Its omni-directional reception eliminates the need for manual adjustments, while its adjustable signal booster ensures optimal performance in high and low strength areas. The Omnimax Pro is perfect for use in the UK and is Maxview's best selling aerial in mainland Europe, providing a wide range of coverage for your travels, and peace of mind that you are purchasing from a reputable brand.

The Omnimax Pro is manufactured in the UK and comes with a 2 year warranty.

Maxview Omnimax Pro Features:

  • Omni-Directional
  • Compact and lightweight
  • Variable signal booster
  • Easy to install
  • 5m Coaxial cable
  • 1m F to Coaxial Flyhead
  • 2 years guarantee
  • 12/24V DC

Omnimax Pro Specification:

  • Compatibility: SD, HD, 3D, 4K TV & DAB/FM Radio
  • Frequency Range: Wideband for UHF TV and VHF radio
  • Gain: Up to 19dB with Variable Signal Booster
  • Power: Requires 12/24V to power Variable Signal Booster
  • Mounting: Can be mounted using screws and flexible adhesive sealant, or the EPDM seal included
  • Aerial Height: 30cm
  • Aerial Weight: 0.5kg

Variable Signal Booster Specification:

  • Compatibility: Digital TV and FM/DAB radio
  • Frequency Range: Wideband for UHF TV and VHF radio
  • Power Supply: 12/24 DC (Included)
  • Power Consumption: Low (50mA)
  • Inputs: 1
  • Outputs: 2
  • Variable Gain: 0 - 19dB
  • Noise: 3.5dB
  • Dimensions: H 51 x W 143 x D 31.5mm

Product Name: Dimatec Campervan LED Aluminium Touch Spotlight
Product Description:
Dimatec LED Aluminium Touch Spotlight

The Dimatec LED Aluminium Touch Spotlight is a high-quality recessed downlight designed for versatile use in motorhomes, vans, campervans, caravans, boats, and other compact spaces. Crafted with a sleek aluminium body and a durable nickel finish, this spotlight not only enhances your interior but also provides a warm, inviting ambiance. This Dimatec LED Aluminium Touch Spotlight is the perfect choice for those looking to enhance their living spaces with modern, energy-efficient lighting that is both stylish and functional.

Key Features:

  • Efficient LED Lighting: Equipped with 15 surface-mounted LEDs, this spotlight delivers bright yet energy-efficient illumination with a power consumption of only 1.2W.
  • Touch Activation: Conveniently turn the light on or off by simply touching the center of the light, eliminating the need for traditional switches.
  • Recessed, Flush Fitting: The spotlight is designed to be flush-fitted into a 42mm diameter hole, offering a clean, seamless installation without the need for screws.
  • Soft, Diffused Light: The opaque lens ensures a warm white light output (3000°K) that is evenly diffused, creating a comfortable atmosphere.
  • Compact and Versatile: With a compact diameter of 65mm, this light is ideal for small spaces and can be used in a variety of settings, from vehicles to marine environments.
  • Easy Installation: The spotlight push-fits securely into place with no screws required, and the connection is made via flying leads for a straightforward setup.

Specifications:

  • Diameter: 65 mm
  • Mounting Hole Diameter: 42 mm
  • Voltage: 12 V
  • Power Consumption: 1.5 W
  • Color Temperature: 3000 °K (Warm White)
  • Material: Aluminium
  • Light Source: 15 Surface Mounted LEDs
  • Item Number: S0201WAL2

Dimatec 12V 3W LED COB Spotlight

12V Campervan COB Spotlight

The Dimatec 12V Spotlight is designed with the latest LED COB technology, this 12 volt recessed spotlight is an energy efficient campervan spotlight. Designed for easy installation and efficiency, these spotlights are perfect for adding a touch of modern elegance to your mobile living space. Key Features:

  • Anthracite Finish: Ideal for dark wood worktops for modern aesthetic look.

Product Description:
Robens Voyager Versa 3 Tent

Three Man Lightweight Camping Tent

The Robens Voyager Versa 3 is an incredible 3 person tent suitable for outdoor camping trips, trekking, long hikes and family adventures. Enjoy a stable and comfortable camping experience with this three-person tunnel tent thanks to its ripstop polyester outer, flat pole sleeves, and aluminum alloy poles that ensure durability and stability even in bad weather. The extended porch provides ample space for storage or relaxing, and the side and front doors offer easy access. With versatile features like a toggled-back front porch wall and end rear panel, enjoy maximum ventilation and airflow. Perfect for all your outdoor adventures and family camping trips. The lightweight Voyager Versa 3 tent is designed to be easy for transport with its compact pack size, making it ideal for backpacking, hiking, cycling holidays and multi-day camping adventures.

 

Robens Voyager Versa Features:

  • Front and rear access doors can be toggled back for maximum ventilation
  • Easily adjustable pole tension
  • Extended porch for gear, cooking and dining
  • Luminous zip pulls for easy access in limited light
  • Colour coded alloy poles and pole sleeves for easy pitching
  • Pole sleeves closed one end for easy pole insertion
  • Adjustable main pegging points feature sturdy alloy buckles
  • Fire Retardant - The fabric does not burn, but melts when in direct contact with flames
  • Ripstop - Ripstop outer fabrics high resistant to damage and limits tear travel
  • Flat Pole Sleeve - Flat Sleeves allow easy pole threading and create a low profile to reduce wind resistance
  • Taped Seams - Strong flexible and durable tape is glued and heat sealed over flysheet seams for effective long-term waterproofing in this critical area
  • Storage Pocket for Inner Door - Storage pockets for inner doors mean they can be stashed away neatly to open up the space and avoid accidental damage
  • Aluminium Poles - Light, strong, reliable and durable
  • Mosquito Net - Mesh with mosquito net for ventilation and to keep insects out
  • Packsack - Packsack for stowing with roll down closing
  • Tent Weight - The pared down minimum weight and maximum supplied factory weight for the Robens range

Wind Testing

Robens Wind Test: The determination of the performance of a Robens tent in wind is based on the knowledge and technique available to Robens at the time of testing. During the test we register the maximum (MAX) speed impact a tent was subjected and the average (AVG) wind speed at which structural instability occurred. This may appear as a broken/deformed pole, or the collapse of the tent and subsequent return to shape when the wind drops. At no point was any form of catastrophic failure experienced up to the maximum wind speed.

Product Description:
Robens Arch 2 Adventure Tent

Two Man Lightweight Camping Tent

The Robens Arch 2 is the perfect companion for hikers and cyclists looking for compact, lightweight and durable tent. This lightweight 2 person tent features a tapered twin-hoop design that offers all the features and comfort required for less demanding adventures. Pitching the Robens Arch 2 is quick and easy, making this tent ideal for trekkers, hikers, cyclists and adventurers in need of a convenient shelter at the end of a long day. The tent features a generous internal space and a practical porch for gear and storage, making it a great choice for adventure seekers. The Robens Arch 2 is a the perfect lightweight, 2 person tent for at the end of a tiring day, where relaxation and comfort is needed. The Robens Arch 2 Outdoor Camping Tent is available now!

 

Arch 2 Tent Features:

  • Colour-coded alloy poles and pole sleeves for easy setup
  • Versatile pitching option – Can be pitched without the inner tent
  • Covered ventilation at both ends to maintain airflow while protecting from rain
  • Mesh panel in door for ventilation and bug protection
  • Lantern hanging point for added convenience
  • Fire Retardant Fabric – Fabric melts instead of burning when exposed to direct flames
  • 3000mm Hydrostatic Head – Resists water penetration for enhanced waterproofing
  • Taped seams for long-term waterproofing
  • Rain Safe Vents with hooded covers for adjustable airflow while keeping rain out
  • Storage Pockets for Inner Doors to maximize space and prevent damage
  • Hanging Point System with toggle and ring fastening
  • Lightweight aluminium poles for strength and durability
  • Mosquito Net for bug-free ventilation
  • Packsack with roll-down closure for easy stowing

Wind Testing

Robens Wind Test: The determination of the performance of a Robens tent in wind is based on the knowledge and technique available to Robens at the time of testing. During the test we register the maximum (MAX) speed impact a tent was subjected and the average (AVG) wind speed at which structural instability occurred. This may appear as a broken/deformed pole, or the collapse of the tent and subsequent return to shape when the wind drops. At no point was any form of catastrophic failure experienced up to the maximum wind speed.

Product Description:
Robens Trail Tarp Camping Shelter in 3m or 4m

Lightweight Camping Shelter

The Robens Trail Tarps are a lightweight and versatile camping shelter available in 3x3m and 4x4m sizes. Designed for quick and easy pitching using tarp poles, walking poles, or other methods, it's ideal for basecamps, bivouacs, or trailside breaks. This durable tarp offers reliable all-weather protection from rain, wind, and sun, with a 3000mm hydrostatic head for enhanced waterproofing. Features include fire retardant fabric (melting rather than burning when exposed to direct flames), ripstop technology to limit tear travel, and taped seams for long-term water resistance. Supplied with a packsack featuring a roll-down closure for convenient storage.

The Robens Trail Tarps are ideal for light camping or backpacking and can quickly cover hammocks, picnics, kayaks, or act as a tent porch.

 

Robens Trail Features:

  • Quick Setup
  • Versatile
  • Fire Retardant Fabric
  • 3000mm Hydrostatic Head
  • Ripstop technology fabric is highly resistant to damage and limits tears
  • Taped seams ensure long-term water resistance
  • Carry bag included
Product Availability: Robens Tarp is sent via next working day courier

Product Description:
Robens Settler Folding Camping Bed

Lightweight Camping Bed

The Robens Settler Camp Bed is a lightweight camping bed designed to provide you a comfy nights sleep during your camping adventures. The Robens Settler Camp Bed is equipped with corner straps to secure an insulated mat (not included), providing additional warmth in cold conditions. It also features a carry bag for convenient transport and folds down to a compact size for easy packing. Assembly is quick and straightforward, making the Robens Settler Bed an excellent choice for efficient, comfortable outdoor sleeping.

 

Settler Camping Bed Features:

  • Small pack size
  • Lifts you off uneven ground for a good night's sleep
  • Corner straps hold an insulated mat in place when used in cold conditions
  • Carry bag for transport included
  • Easy and quick assembly

Product Name: Reimo Trapez Premium Tailgate Tent for Trafic, Transit Custom, Vivaro
Product Description:
Reimo Trapez Premium Tailgate Tent

The Reimo Trapez Premium is a compact, lightweight, and easy-to-set-up rear tent designed to maximize your outdoor adventures. Its innovative features make it the ideal companion for camping trips, festivals, and outdoor events. This tailgate tent is ideal for vehicles such as; Renault Trafic, Toyota Proace, Ford Transit Custom, Nissan NV300, Vauxhall Vivaro.

Enjoy protection from mosquitoes and insects with full coverage mosquito netting on all zip doors. The sewn-in floor can be attached to the bumper with Velcro and provides bug and dirt protection for your vehicle. For added versatility, the front door can be used as a sun sail with the additional poles to enjoy sitting outside during sunny days or light showers. Tinted side windows with roll-away curtains offer privacy and protection from the sun, while the additional ventilation keeps the interior cool and comfortable. Finally, the skylight window lays over your rear window, allowing you to enjoy the starry night sky from the comfort of your tent.

Reimo Trapez Premium Features:

  • Lightweight
  • Sewn-in floor
  • Small pack size
  • No poles (besides canopy poles) for a simple setup
  • Door can be used as a sun canopy with the included poles
  • All-round mosquito net for protection from bugs and mosquitoes
  • Clear window on the roof allows your rear window to act as a skylight when the tent is pitched

Trapez Premium Tailgate Tent Specification:

  • Width: 230 cm
  • Depth: 220 cm
  • Weight: 4.5 kg
  • Package contents: Tent, guy ropes, 2 pitching poles and carry bag

Reimo Trapez Premium fits Vehicles:

  • Citroën Jumper
  • Peugeot Expert
  • Toyota Proace (all from 2005)
  • Ford Transit Custom
  • Fiat Talento
  • Nissan NV300
  • Vauxhall (Opel) Vivaro / Vivaro C and Zafira Life (from 2009 to 2019)

Please note the Trapez Premium is incompatible with the Ford Tourneo. This tailgate tent is not suitable for vehicles with spoilers fitted.
Product Warranty: The Reimo Trapez Premium comes with a 1 year warranty
Product Availability: The Reimo Trapez Premium is available with a next-day courier

Product Description:
Robens Pioneer 2EX & 4EX Tent

Two/Four Man Lightweight Camping Tent

The Robens Pioneer EX tent forms part of Robens Route Range of technical entry level tents built for 3 season camping and trekking. With comfortable living space the Robens Pioneer EX tunnel tent range is stable and easy to pitch. It has a single side door and a generous porch area, with plenty of space for gear storage and headroom to sit relaxing during adverse weather. Front and back vents create air flow to minimise condensation. Inside the main compartment, there's room stash pockets to secure doors out of the way. Rainproof vents at either end maintain airflow while the nylon mesh inner keeps things light, airy and bug free.

 

The Pioneer 2EX (2-person) weighs only 2.9 kg, making it easy to split between two hikers, while the Pioneer 4EX (4-person) is perfect for family camping or two campers seeking extra space. From backpacking to weekend camping, the Pioneer EX tent offers excellent value and functionality. The Robens Pioneer 2EX & 4EX Outdoor Tents are available to by now!

 

Robens Pioneer Tent Features:

  • Colour-coded alloy poles and pole sleeves for easy setup
  • Extended porch for additional storage space
  • Covered ventilation at both ends to maintain airflow while protecting from rain
  • Mesh panel in door for ventilation and bug protection
  • Lantern hanging point for added convenience
  • Fire Retardant Fabric – Fabric melts instead of burning when exposed to direct flames
  • 3000mm Hydrostatic Head – Resists water penetration for enhanced waterproofing
  • Taped Seams – Sealed seams ensure long-term water resistance
  • Rain Safe Vents – Hooded vents provide adjustable airflow while keeping rain out
  • Storage Pockets for Inner Doors to maximize space and prevent damage
  • Hanging Point System with toggle and ring fastening
  • Aluminium poles – Lightweight, strong, and durable
  • Mosquito Net for bug-free ventilation
  • Packsack with roll-down closure for easy stowing

Wind Testing

Robens Wind Test: The determination of the performance of a Robens tent in wind is based on the knowledge and technique available to Robens at the time of testing. During the test we register the maximum (MAX) speed impact a tent was subjected and the average (AVG) wind speed at which structural instability occurred. This may appear as a broken/deformed pole, or the collapse of the tent and subsequent return to shape when the wind drops. At no point was any form of catastrophic failure experienced up to the maximum wind speed.

Lightweight Camping Sleeping Bag

Stay warm and comfortable during your cool summer adventures with the Robens Glacier I 1°C Sleeping Bag. This lightweight and compact bag is designed to provide optimal insulation and comfort in a variety of conditions. Whether you're camping, hiking, or backpacking, this versatile bag will keep you cozy and well-rested throughout your outdoor adventures.

  • Shark Fin Footbox Construction for a comfortable and secure fit

  • Anti-snag zipper protector for durability
  • Suspension loops for aeration and drying
  • PFC-free for environmental sustainability
  • Air Thermo technology for great heat retention

During the test we register the maximum (MAX) speed impact a tent was subjected and the average (AVG) wind speed at which structural instability occurred. This may appear as a broken/deformed pole, or the collapse of the tent and subsequent return to shape when the wind drops. Product Name: Dolphin Supreme M550 Electronic Swimming Pool Cleaner
Product Description:
Dolphin Supreme M550 Robotic Swimming Pool Cleaner

Electronic Pool Cleaner

The Dolphin M550 Swimming Pool Cleaner is the perfect advanced robotic pool cleaner for your swimming pool. Designed to handle even the most stubborn debris with ease, the Dolphin M550 combines powerful performance with cutting-edge technology to ensure your pool is clean. The Dolphin M550 Swimming Pool Cleaner offers superior scrubbing and water filtration, this cleaner simplifies pool maintenance, making it both efficient and effortless. With the Dolphin M550, you can relax and enjoy your pool while trusting that the smartest, most efficient robotic cleaner is taking care of the dirty work.

Supreme M550 Key Features:

  • Advanced Cleaning Performance: The Dolphin M550 excels in scrubbing and filtering with its Dual Active Scrubber brushes and comprehensive waterline cleaning capabilities. The gyroscopic navigation system ensures full coverage of your pool's floor, walls, and waterline.
  • MyDolphin™ Plus App Connectivity: Stay in control from anywhere with the MyDolphin™ Plus mobile app. Schedule cleanings, select modes, and monitor your cleaner remotely, providing unmatched convenience and flexibility.
  • Efficient Filtration: Equipped with a top-access multi-layer filter basket, including rough, fine, and ultra-fine dirt filtration. The cleaner’s extra sealing ensures that all types of debris are effectively captured and retained.
  • Dynamic Navigation: The M550’s dynamic dual-drive motor, combined with multi-directional water outlets, offers precise navigation and smooth maneuverability around your pool.
  • Ease of Use: With its programmable weekly timer and easy-to-use controls, the M550 offers a simple yet effective solution for maintaining a clean pool.
  • Powerful Suction: The cleaner provides a robust suction rate of 20.0 m³/h, ensuring thorough removal of dirt and debris.
  • Convenient Pick-Up: The cleaner’s "Pick Me Up" feature allows it to come to the surface for easy retrieval.
  • Durable and Versatile: Ideal for pools up to 15 meters in length, the M550 is suitable for various pool shapes including rectangular, round, freeform, and kidney-shaped pools.

Specifications:

  • Maximum Pool Length: 15 meters
  • Cleaning Coverage: Floor, Walls & Waterline
  • Brushing: Dual Active Scrubber
  • Cleaning Cycle Time: Default mode: 2 hours, Fast mode: 1 hour (floor only)
  • Programmable Weekly Timer: Yes
  • Filtration: Top-access multi-layer filter basket with extra sealing; includes rough, fine, and ultra-fine dirt filters
  • Cable Length: 18 meters, tangle-free
  • Navigation and Maneuverability: Dynamic dual-drive motor with multi-directional water outlets
  • Mobile App: MyDolphin™ Plus for remote control
  • Caddy Included: Yes
  • Cleaning Coverage: Floor, Walls, and Waterline
  • Filter Type: Combine Filter Kit; Additional Ultra-Fine Filter Kit included
  • Anti-Tangling Swivel: Yes
  • Caddy or Stand Included: Caddy
  • Mobile Application: MyDolphin™ Plus
  • Delay Feature: No
  • Robot Weight: 10.24 kg
  • Net Dimensions: L 44.21cm, W 40.23cm, H 31.83cm

Product Name: Dolphin Liberty 400 Electronic Swimming Pool Cleaner
Product Description:
Dolphin Liberty 400 Robotic Swimming Pool Cleaner

Electronic Swimming Pool cleaner

The Dolphin LIBERTY 400 is the ultimate cordless solution for effortless pool cleaning, delivering unmatched agility and performance. Designed for pools up to 10m x 5m, it offers powerful scrubbing action, superior filtration, and customizable cleaning modes to ensure your pool is always spotless. With its 5,000mAh lithium-ion battery and innovative inductive charging, this cleaner operates wirelessly for up to 90 minutes, making it the perfect blend of convenience and reliability.

 

Choose between efficient floor-only cleaning or full coverage of the floor, walls, and waterline using the “Cycle Selector.” The LIBERTY 400’s “Eco Mode” keeps your pool clean all week long with short, energy-saving cycles. Plus, with the MyDolphin™ Plus app, you can easily control and program your cleaner directly from your smartphone. The Dolphin LIBERTY 400 is also equipped with the Click-Up™ retrieval feature, allowing you to remove the cleaner from the pool after each cycle. The Dolphin LIBERTY 400 provides effective pool cleaning with the convenience of a cordless system, ensuring your pool is ready for use at any time.

Liberty 400 Key Features:

  • Cordless Design: Enjoy complete freedom of movement with the Dolphin LIBERTY 400’s cordless operation.
  • Cycle Selector: Choose between floor-only cleaning or full floor, walls, and waterline coverage.
  • Eco Mode: Maintain a clean pool all week with energy-efficient cleaning cycles.
  • Powerful Active Scrubbing: Thoroughly scrubs away stubborn dirt and debris on all pool surfaces.
  • Interchangeable Filtration: Switch between fine and ultra-fine filters to tackle different levels of dirt and debris.
  • Top Access Filter: Easy, convenient access for quick filter cleaning and maintenance.
  • Click-Up™ Retrieval: A sound-activated system that helps the robot climb up the wall for easy removal from the pool.
  • MyDolphin™ Plus App: Control and customize cleaning programs from your smartphone, with always-on connectivity.
  • Lightweight: Weighing just 8.1kg, it’s easy to handle and transport.


Specifications:

  • Ideal Pool Size: Up to 10m x 5m (33 feet)
  • Cleaning Coverage: Floor, walls, and waterline
  • Battery: 5,000mAh lithium-ion, 90 minutes of operation
  • Cycle Time: 1.5 hours
  • Charging Time: Up to 6 hours with inductive charging
  • Filtration: Fine & Ultra-fine interchangeable filters
  • Weight: 8.1kg (18 lbs)
  • Navigation: Wireless
  • App Control: MyDolphin™ Plus (Wi-Fi connected)
  • Brush Type: Active scrubbing brush for all pool finishes
  • Warranty: 3 years limited

Product Description:
Easy Camp Adventure Aluminium Coffee Pot

Lightweight Camping Coffee Pot

The Easy Camp Coffee Pot is the ultimate camping coffee pot. This ideal Easy Camp Coffee Pot can be used over fire so you can have a perfect brew when camping. Use the top handle for use with tripod and handle on side for easy operating. The Easy Camp Adventure Coffee Pot includes removable lid with transparent knob to monitor coffee. This unmitigated coffee pot is made from lightweight aluminium, making it the perfect travel buddy. This coffee pot includes a percolator.

 

To make the perfect brew, pour water and the desired amount of ground coffee, put the lid on and put directly over heat. Hot water will be driven up the delivery tube onto the inside of the lid where it will drip over the coffee, extracting flavour as it circulates. For the best strength wait about 7 minutes. Pour into your favourite mug and enjoy!

 

Camping Coffee Pot Key Features:

  • Can be used over a fire or stove
  • Top handle for use with tripod and handle on side for easy operating
  • Detachable lid with transparent knob to see coffee brew
  • Lightweight aluminium material - for long life avoid contact with acidic and salty foods
  • Includes percolator

Product Description:
Robens Voyager 3EX Outdoor Tent

Three Man Lightweight Camping Tent

Ideally suited to campers looking to balance useable camping space with a lightweight, small pack sized tent. The Voyager 3EX features an extended porch, perfect for expedition pack storage or for bad weather relaxation. This compact, lightweight tunnel tent features ripstop polyester outer, flat pole sleeves and aluminium alloy poles. The Robens Voyager weight is low enough that it can be split amongst occupants or as a spacious option if harsh weather is expected. Whether you're looking for a 3 person tent for backpacking, bike touring, trekking or adventure weekends the Robens Voyager 3EX tent is a great option. Perfect for family adventures, or group mountain hiking. Get the Robens Voyager 3EX Outdoor Camping Tent today!

 

Robens Voyager 3EX Features:

  • Rain Safe Vents - Hooded vents provide adjustable airflow while keeping rain out
  • Aluminium Poles - Lightweight, durable, and easily adjustable pole tension
  • Extended porch for additional storage, gear, cooking and dining
  • Luminous zip pulls for easy access in limited light
  • Colour coded alloy poles and pole sleeves for easy setup
  • Pole sleeves closed one end for easy pole insertion
  • Adjustable main pegging points featuring sturdy alloy buckles

Wind Testing

Robens Wind Test: The determination of the performance of a Robens tent in wind is based on the knowledge and technique available to Robens at the time of testing. During the test we register the maximum (MAX) speed impact a tent was subjected and the average (AVG) wind speed at which structural instability occurred. This may appear as a broken/deformed pole, or the collapse of the tent and subsequent return to shape when the wind drops. At no point was any form of catastrophic failure experienced up to the maximum wind speed.

Product Description:
Robens Lodge 2 Outdoor Camping Tent

Two Man Lightweight Camping Tent

The Robens Lodge 2 Outdoor Camping Tent is a 3 season, lightweight tent that combines a dome-style design with a short transverse ridge pole, offering flexible living, cooking, twin porch area and storage space. Its excellent internal height and width allow two campers to sit side by side comfortably. This lightweight tent ideal for backpacking, hiking, cycling holidays, and multi-day camping adventures. This amazing tent features twin doors that provide campers with independent access and versatile door-opening options to protect against wind. The mesh panels provide excellent ventilation, keeping the interior cool and reducing condensation. Its robust structure ensures that the tent remains stable even in challenging conditions thanks to the its sturdy features. The Robens Lodge 2 Tent is designed with lightweight materials and a compact pack size for easy transport, perfect for long adventures.

 

Robens Lodge 2 Features:

  • Luminous zip pulls for easy access in limited light
  • Adjustable main pegging points feature sturdy alloy buckles
  • Fire Retardant - The fabric does not burn, but melts when in direct contact with flames
  • 5000mm Hydrostatic Head – Resists water penetration for enhanced waterproofing
  • Taped seams for long-term waterproofing
  • Flat Pole Sleeve - Flat sleeves allow easy pole threading and create a low profile to reduce wind resistance
  • Storage Pockets for Inner Doors to maximize space and prevent damage
  • Gear Loft for handy storage of light items such as headlamp and maps
  • Aluminium poles – Lightweight, strong, and durable
  • Mosquito Net for bug-free ventilation
  • Packsack for stowing with roll down closing

Wind Testing

Robens Wind Test: The determination of the performance of a Robens tent in wind is based on the knowledge and technique available to Robens at the time of testing. During the test we register the maximum (MAX) speed impact a tent was subjected and the average (AVG) wind speed at which structural instability occurred. This may appear as a broken/deformed pole, or the collapse of the tent and subsequent return to shape when the wind drops. At no point was any form of catastrophic failure experienced up to the maximum wind speed.

Product Name: Calorex V-PAC (X-Range) Swimming Pool Side Outlet Extended Season Heat Pump
Option Set: Calorex V-Pac X Range Heat Pump
Product Description:
Calorex V-PAC X-Range Side Outlet Heat Pump

The Calorex V-PAC Side Outlet Heat Pump is a premium solution for precise and energy-efficient pool heating. Designed with advanced inverter technology, the V-PAC series is ideal for outdoor and private pools, spa pools, and wellness centers. It ensures extended comfort throughout the UK pool season, operating effectively even in air temperatures as low as -5°C. With environmentally responsible refrigerant and robust performance, the V-PAC range is the perfect choice for energy-efficient heating with minimal environmental impact.

Key Features:

  • Inverter Technology: Automatically adjusts heat output based on demand, optimizing energy consumption and reducing operational costs. Provides quieter operation with reduced noise levels compared to conventional heat pumps.
  • Eco-Friendly Refrigerant: Uses R32 refrigerant with a low Global Warming Potential (GWP) of 675, offering an environmentally friendly solution.
  • Multiple Power Ratings: The V-PAC range offers power ratings from 12kW to 22kW, accommodating different pool sizes.
  • Compact Design: Small footprint for easy installation, with sizes starting from 650 x 650 x 835 mm.
  • Reduced Noise: Reduces sound levels to less than 30 dB(A) at 10 meters, ensuring minimal noise during operation.
  • Wi-Fi Connectivity: Built-in Wi-Fi allows for remote control via smartphone, making it easy to adjust settings from anywhere.
  • Flexible Operation: Supports heating, cooling, and heat/cool modes for year-round comfort.
  • High Efficiency: Achieves an average COP of 9.7 at 50% speed, significantly improving energy efficiency compared to traditional systems.
  • Durable Build: Constructed with a titanium condenser and aluminium casing for long-lasting durability in harsh UK climates.

Product Name: HE300B Heatek Replacement Water Heating Element
Product Description:
HE300B Heatek Replacement Heating Element

For Truma Therme TT2 and Heatek 6L Boiler

Is your caravan's or camper's water heater struggling to deliver hot water? A calcified or defective heating element could be the culprit. The Heatek HE300B Heating Element is designed to replace the original Truma Therme TT2 and Heatek 6L boiler heating elements, this high-quality component ensures reliable and efficient performance.

The thermostat in the heating element is positioned within a hollow tube and measures the water temperature directly at the center of the tank, ensuring precise temperature control.

HE300B Heating Element Features:

  • Precision Temperature Control: Ensures optimal water temperature, minimizing the risk of Legionella bacteria.
  • CE-marked and drinking water safe, adhering to 98/83/EC European drinking water standard
  • Suitable for Truma Therme TT2 (art. no. 6259900) and Heatek 6L boiler
  • Replaces Truma Therme TT2 heating element (manufacturer's part no. 40050-14200)
  • Includes O-ring for a watertight connection to the boiler

HE300B Heatek Element Technical Specifications:

  • Connection Voltage: 220 – 240 VAC
  • Power: 300W
  • Power Consumption: 1.3A
  • Temperature: 65℃
  • Overheating Protection: 85℃
  • Power Cord Length: 1m
  • Material Element: Stainless steel
  • Warranty: 2 years
  • Item Code: 3408210

Product Name: Plastica Deluxe Winter Debris Pool Cover
Product Description:
Plastica Deluxe Winter Debris Pool Cover

Swimming Pool Cover

The Plastica Deluxe Winter Pool Covers are the perfect winter covers for your swimming pool. These covers come in various sizes top suit your swimming pool needs, sizes include; 10ft x 12ft, 12ft x 24ft, 14ft x 28ft, 15ft x 30ft, 16ft x 32ft, 18ft x 36ft, 20ft x 40ft. These covers protect your pool from leaves, debris and frost damage, while allowing rainwater to pass though to prevent dirty water build up on top of the cover. These Delux Winter Pool Covers feature a durable green/blaCk finish, reinforced edges, and straps to keep it secured. With a 300mm overlap, these winter covers provide a taut, wind-resistant barrier that also minimises wear and tear. The Plastica Deluxe Winter Debris Pool Covers come with P-anchors and springs to securely fasten the cover using a 6mm drill bit, along with plugs for when not in use. The Plastica Winter Debris Cover is the ideal choice for pool owners seeking reliable, long-lasting protection through harsh winters. Invest in a cover that keeps your pool free of debris and minimizes the need for costly spring cleanups and repairs.

 

Pool Cover Key Features:

  • Prevents Pool Contamination: Acts as a barrier against leaves and debris, reducing straining and water discolouration.
  • Frost Damage Protection: Helps shield your pool from the damaging effects of frost during the colder months.
  • Durable Woven Polyethylene: UV-stabilised material that resists weathering, ensuring long-lasting protection.
  • Reinforced Design: Triple-stiched green/black webbing with rot-proof thread for durability.
  • Easy Fit and Maintenance: These covers come complete with P-anchors and springs for secure installation into the pool decking using a 6mm drill bit.
  • Abrasion Resistant: Anti-chafing straps underneath the cover that resist abrasion from the pool coping stones
  • Efficient Water Drainage: Allows rainwater to pass through, preventing standing water and reducing maintenance.

Product Name: Pentair InverTemp-FL Heat Pump for Pools 30m³-105m³
Product Description:
Pentair InverTemp-FL Heat Pump for Pools 30m³-105m³

Swimming Pool Heat Pump

The Pentair InverTemp-FL Heat Pump is a top of the range heating solution for your pool! The Pentair InverTemp-FL heat pump automatically adjusts to keep your pool at the perfect temperature, whether heating or cooling is required. With the Pentair InverTemp-FL Heat Pumps full inverter technology, this energy-efficient pump adapts to external conditions, optimizing performance and reducing consumption. This incredible Heat Pump features an inverter compressor and variable-speed fan, providing powerful yet quiet operation. Control the system easily with a smartphone app or its built-in WiFi TFT screen, making temperature adjustments simple and convenient. Designed for both comfort and efficiency, the InverTemp-FL Heat Pump operates down to -15°C, includes eco-friendly R32 refrigerant, and has an independent defrosting function. Its unique design minimizes noise (<42 dB) and ensures seamless poolside comfort all year round. Get yours today!

 

Heat Pump Key Features:

  • Full Inverter Technology: Utilises inverter compressor and variable speed fan
  • 3 working modes: Boost, Smart & Eco. Easy to use and control with LCD screen or via smartphone
  • Equipped with Pentair ModBus card: Can be control by Pentair automation
  • Automatic Heating and Cooling: Maintains desired pool temperature, adapting to outdoor conditions
  • Full Inverter Technology: High performance with low energy consumption
  • Quiet Operation: Noise levels below 42 dB in Boost Mode
  • Remote Control: Manage via smartphone app or WiFi TFT screen
  • Eco-Friendly: Uses R32 refrigerant and requires no fuel storage
  • Durable Design: Titanium exchanger ensures a long service life
  • Low Temperature Operation: Reversible head pump with automatic active defrost functionality. Functions efficiently in temperatures as low as -15°C

Product Name: Avtex AMR105X Dual Sim Mobile Router & Antenna 4G/5G Wi-Fi 6
Product Description:
Avtex AMR105X 5G Ultrafast Dual Sim Router

5G Wi-Fi 6 Mobile Internet Solution Ultrafast Dual Sim Router

The Avtex AMR105X is a powerful 5G Wi-Fi 6 mobile router designed to provide you with the ultimate in connectivity. With its dual SIM functionality and high-gain antenna, you can enjoy uninterrupted internet access even in remote locations. Stream, browse  and share with this new high speed, 5G compatible antenna package.

The AMR105X features a 2.8” colour screen to enable the monitoring of the router's status and displaying details like signal strength, service provider, and monthly data usage. This Dual Sim Router is fully unlocked for all networks, offering users the flexibility to switch between LTE and WiFi as needed to reduce roaming charges. It also features a DC isolation switch to power the router off when not in use to minimise battery drain.

The AMR105X antenna utilises the latest technology to fully support 3G, 4G and 5G.

Features

Antenna

  • High-Gain Antenna: Maximize signal reception for a strong and stable connection.
  • Low profile omni directional MiMo antenna
  • Works in motion or stationery
  • 3G/4G/5G compatible 
  • Available in three colours

Router

  • 5G Wi-Fi 6: Enjoy ultra-fast download and upload speeds, perfect for streaming and browsing
  • 2.8" LED Color Display: Monitor your router's status, signal strength, and data usage with ease
  • Dual SIM: Switch between networks effortlessly to reduce roaming costs and ensure optimal coverage
  • Security: Protect your network with WPA, WPA2, and WPA3 security protocols
  • Connect to existing Wi-Fi network to reduce data cost
  • E-mark certified for automotive installations
  • Operates on both 5Ghz and 2.4Ghz
  • Toggle between LTE / WIFI
  • 2x Gigabit Ethernet Ports
  • DC on/off isolating switch
  • Easy installation
  • 12V / 24V
  • Mains adapter optional (not included)

Product Name: Plastica Large Standard Slidelock Pool Reel
Product Description:
Plastica Large Standard Sidelock Pool Reel

The Plastica Large Standard Slidelock Reel is widely regarded as the best domestic pool cover reel on the market, offering years of reliable and smooth operation. Manufactured in the UK from polished stainless steel and anodized aluminum, this high-quality reel is designed to make covering and uncovering your pool fast and effortless. With its robust construction, the Slidelock Reel ensures long-lasting performance, keeping your pool cleaner and warmer with minimal effort. Equipped with high-quality bearings, two steering wheels, and crank handles, the Slidelock Reel is easy to use and can be supplied motorized for semi-automated functionality. It telescopes from 5m to 6.7m, making it suitable for pool covers up to 6.4m wide, providing versatility for different pool sizes. Reels should be set up to have a maximum 300mm overlap each side. Maximum recommended area of material on both reels is 75m².

Product Name: Pentair Prowler P20 Robotic Swimming Pool Cleaner
Product Description:
Pentair Prowler P20 Robotic Swimming Pool Cleaner

The Pentair Prowler P20 Robotic Swimming Pool Cleaner is an ideal machine that uses the latest cleaning technologies and smart navigation to clean your pool as efficiently as possible, to clean your pool to the highest standard. The Pentair Prowler P20 uses technology to scan your pool, optimise cleaning, adjust to slopes and automatically corrects its course using smart navigation. Designed for methodical and efficient cleaning, the Prowler P20 a high level of cleanliness for pools up to 12 meters in length. Its compact size, lightweight design, and advanced features make it the perfect choice for effortless pool maintenance. With its fast-moving technology, advanced filtration, and easy-access filter baskets, the Prowler P20 lets you enjoy more time relaxing, and less time maintaining your pool.

Key Features:

  • Superior Cleaning: Methodical and efficient cleaning of the whole pool.
  • Smart Navigation System: Automatically scans the pool, adjusts its speed, and optimises cleaning efficiency.
  • Ultra-Light & Compact: Weighing less than 6kg,  the Prowler P20 is easy to handle and store.
  • No Cable Tangling: The design ensures smooth operation without cable entanglement.
  • Efficient Filtration: Equipped with 100-micron filtration, it provides fine, easy-to-clean filtration with top-access baskets.
  • High Suction Flow Rate: Ensures thorough cleaning of debris, dirt and leaves.
  • Bluetooth Control: Remote control available via a dedicated Bluetooth app for added convenience.
  • Versatile Cleaning Cycles: Choose from 3 cleaning cycles – 1h30, 2h, or 2h30.
  • Easy Maintenance: Top access to the filter baskets for quick cleaning with a garden hose.
  • Beach Entry Detection: Prevents unnecessary operation on dry surfaces.
  • Full Filter Indicator: Alerts you when it’s time to clean the filters.

Vango Serenity Super Warm Sleeping Bag

3 Season Luxury Single and Double Sleeping Bags

The Vango Serenity Superwarm sleeping bag is a premium, 3-season bag with a tog rating of 10, making it ideal for camping from Spring through to Autumn. This square-shaped bag offers generous sleeping space and features double-layer insulation for extra comfort and warmth as well as a soft-touch lining, giving that luxury home-from-home feel in your tent, caravan or motorhome. Available as single and double sleeping bags.

  • Polair Super Soft Shell soft to touch 210T microfibre shell fabric is super cosy, snug and breathable
  • Hanging Loops for quick and easy drying
  • Integrated Headrest for extra comfort and warmth 
  • Auto-Lock Two-Way Zip provides adjustable ventilation
  • Thermo Lock Pro Insulation retains loft in damp conditions
  • Grade A Quality Fill Type 60% Single Hole siliconised hollow fibre/40% polyester fill

Product Name: Whale Watermaster Motorhome  Water Pump with 12V Easi-Push Plug
Product Description:
Whale Watermaster Motorhome Water Pump with 12V Easi-Push Plug

The Whale Watermaster Motorhome Water Pump comes equip with a 12V Easi-Push Plug for your ease of use. The Whale Watermaster High Flow Water Pump is the perfect solution for seamlessly connecting a  water supply to your Motorhome, Caravan or Boat. The Watermaster ensures reliable freshwater supply between an outside water container and your vehicle, great for outdoor adventures wherever you go! This pump is specifically designed to be used with the Truma Ultraflow Housing interior sockets.

Key Features:

  • High Flow Rate: With a flow rate of 15.8 liters per minute at 1 meter head and 12.8 liters per minute at 3 meters head, this pump is ideal for supplying water to 1 or 2 outlet systems, including showers.
  • Durable Build: Made from high-quality materials, including ABS pump body, nitrile seals, and a PVC-insulated copper wire, this pump is designed to withstand demanding conditions.
  • Anti Air-Locking Technology: The built-in anti air-locking pump enhances system performance, ensuring smooth water flow at all times.
  • System Compatibility: Whether your system is microswitched or pressurised, the Watermaster is built to work flawlessly in either setup.
  • Easy Installation: The Easi-Push plug ensures a secure and simple connection, making setup a breeze, while the flexible hose design adds convenience.

Product Name: Sargent 20 Amp 12V 2-Stage DC-DC Van Battery Charger
Product Description:
20 Amp 2-Stage DC-DC Van Battery Charger

The 20 AMP Compact Battery Charger is perfect for your van conversions. This cost-effective charger is especially ideal for vehicles equipped with smart alternators, such as Euro6 models. The Sargent 20 Amp Battery Charger uses power from your vehicle's alternator or battery to charge your campervan or motorhome's leisure battery. Designed for on-the-go charging, this charger delivers 20 Amps to your leisure battery using its 2-stage charging profile for super fast, reliable performance while driving. The 20 Amp 2-Stage DC-DC Battery Charger works with most types of batteries, including Lead Acid, AGM, and LiFePO4, making it a perfect charging solution for van conversions when your leisure battery needs charging on the go. This charger is designed for optimal performance in van conversions, motorhomes, and other recreational vehicles, offering high-efficiency charging with minimal noise and easy installation. The charger can deliver up to 20 amps of power to your battery, and is housed in a rugged casing. An intelligent cooling fan ensures uninterrupted operation in warmer climates, and quiet operation when not required.

Key Features:

  • Versatile Compatibility: Works with most leisure battery types, including Lead Acid, AGM, and LiFePO4 (check compatibility with your battery manufacturer).
  • Smart Alternator Compatibility: Ideal for vehicles with smart alternators, such as Euro6 models.
  • High Efficiency: 94% efficiency at 12V ensures optimal energy use, keeping your battery charged while minimising waste.
  • Durable Design: The rugged, waterproof casing (IP68 rating) provides reliable protection against the elements, and its fanless cooling system ensures silent operation.
  • Easy Installation: Comes with a plug-and-play connector kit for quick and simple setup.
  • On-The-Go Charging: Charges your vans battery with 20 Amps while driving

Product Name: Sargent 20 / 30 Amp 12V 3-Stage DC-DC Van Battery Charger
Product Description:
20 / 30 Amp 3-Stage DC-DC Van Battery Charger

These DC-DC chargers provide rapid with configurable charging profiles, multi-stage charging for leisure batteries by utilizing power from your vehicle's battery and alternator. Both units are perfect for vehicles equipped with smart alternators, such as Euro6 models, and offer reliable, efficient charging while on the move. The Sargent 20 Amp and 30 Amp Battery Chargers use power from your vehicle's alternator or battery to charge your campervan or motorhome's leisure battery, this allows for rapid multi-stage charging, even in vehicles equipped with smart alternator - which includes all modern Euro6 compliant vehicles. Choose between the 20 Amp and 30 Amp models based on your power needs, both use 3-stage charging to ensure efficient power delivery to your battery across all voltage levels. Both chargers support Lead Acid, Gel, AGM, and LiFePO4 battery types (check compatibility with your battery manufacturer). Both chargers are designed for optimal performance in van conversions, motorhomes, and other recreational vehicles, offering high-efficiency charging with minimal noise and easy installation. These chargers can deliver up to 20 or 30 amps of power to your battery, and are housed in a rugged casing. An intelligent cooling fan ensures uninterrupted operation in warmer climates, and quiet operation when not required.

Key Features:

  • 3-Stage Charging: Both models use a 3-stage charging profile for fast, efficient battery charging while driving.
  • Smart Alternator Compatibility: Ideal for vehicles with smart alternators, such as Euro6 models.
  • Versatile Battery Support: Compatible with multiple leisure battery types, including Lead Acid, Gel, AGM, and LiFePO4.
  • Durable Build: Both units feature a rugged extruded casing with intelligent fan cooling to ensure quiet operation.
  • Easy Installation: Comes with a plug-and-play connector kit for a simple setup (30 Amp model only).
  • On-The-Go Charging: Charges your vans battery with 20 Amps while driving

Product Name: Sargent Campervan Modular Power System with 7" Display
Product Description:
Sargent Modular Power System with 7" Touchscreen Display

The Modular Power System is an innovative and versatile solution designed for efficient power management in recreational vehicles, motorhomes, and campervans. With its compact and flexible design, it allows for seamless installation as a single unit or separate components, making it ideal for spaces where every inch counts. At the heart of this system is the MC100 Hub, which provides essential power distribution, switching, and monitoring capabilities for various 12V accessories, including heating, lighting, and water systems. The MC200 unit adds an important layer of safety with Residual Current Device (RCD) and Miniature Circuit Breaker (MCB) protection for 230V mains circuits, ensuring secure operation for all your electrical needs. The Modular Power System provides a comprehensive and customizable solution for managing power and enhancing the functionality of your recreational vehicle, ensuring a comfortable and efficient travel experience.

Key Features:

  • EC970 Touchscreen Display: A large 7" touchscreen interface offers intuitive control and real-time monitoring of lighting, power usage, water levels, and environmental sensors, enhancing usability and convenience.
  • Flexible Installation Options: Install the components together or separately to optimize available space in your vehicle.
  • Expandable Connectivity: Easily expand your system with intelligent CAN Bus accessories, including lithium batteries, solar regulators, ultrasonic water sensors, and battery chargers, allowing for customized power solutions.
  • Multiple Input Options: The MC100 hub features two 20A battery inputs and a 25A charger input, enabling efficient power management for leisure activities.
  • Comprehensive Monitoring: Track fresh and waste water levels with up to four fresh water inputs and one waste water input, ensuring effective management of onboard resources.

Dimatec Campervan Awning 12V LED Strip for Above Door

Above Door Awning LED Light Strip

Product Description:
Maypole 4A 6/12V Electronic Smart Charger 7423

Maypole Battery Charger - Automatic charging for vehicles up to 2.5L.

The Maypole Battery Charger is perfect for cars, vans, caravans, and motorhomes, this smart charger is compatible with 6V & 12V lead-acid and 12V AGM batteries with capacities from 1.2Ah to 120Ah. With advanced automatic voltage detection, a 5-stage charging cycle, and multiple safety features, the battery charger ensures optimal charging performance and battery maintenance. This compact, high-frequency smart charger is easy to use, safe, and designed for reliable battery maintenance in diverse weather conditions, making it an excellent choice for everyday and seasonal vehicle charging.

Maypole Smart Charger Features:

  • Dual Voltage Support: Suitable for 6V & 12V batteries, including lead-acid and AGM types (excluding GEL batteries)
  • Automatic Detection: Automatically detects battery voltage and condition
  • 4 Charging Modes: Includes 12V Standard, AGM & Winter modes, and 6V Standard mode
  • 5-Stage Charging Cycle: Auto-detects battery condition, re-conditions, charges, and maintains battery health
  • LCD Display: Displays information on reverse polarity, faulty connection, faulty battery, and battery level
  • Safety Features: Includes overload, reverse-polarity, and short-circuit protection
  • Durable Design: IP65 rated, compact, robust, and manufactured to European electrical safety standards
  • User-Friendly: Comes with 1.5m interchangeable battery clip and ring terminal connector leads for flexibility

Product Name: Brunner Vento 12V Electronic Dual Fridge Fan
Product Description:
Brunner Vento 12V Electronic Dual Fridge Fan

Brunner Vento Cooling Fridge Fan for Motorhome, Campervan and Caravan

The Brunner Vento 12V Electronic Dual Fridge Fan is a fantastic solution for cooling your fridge. In your Motorhome, Campervan and Caravan, you can install this handy fridge fan with its simple installation, see paper instructions included or visit below to view installation instructions online. The Brunner Vento Fridge Fan is ideal for cooling your entire fridge unit by cooling the hot air your fridge lets out - removing hot air and dispensing it out of your wall vents. By removing the hot air from behind your fridge, your fridge can perform more efficiently as it can cool down easier and is not being overwhelmed by the heat in the area outside of the fridge. The Brunner Vento operates using dual fans working simultaneously for maximum dispense of hot air through your vents. This reduces energy consumption from your fridge (because fridge is not working as hard to cool down), increases cooling times and improves the temperature stability of your fridge.

 

Installation cannot be easier. The Brunner Vento Fan can be installed in your mobile home, behind the upper fridge vent for maximum efficiency. Simply connect the Brunner Vento Fan to 12V of power using connectors provided. Connections between the fan itself, thermostat and the control panel are plug and play for ease of installation. Brackets for fitting the fan are provided. The Brunner Vento Electronic Fridge Fan has two modes; Auto and Manual. Auto mode automatically operates adjusting the fan speed according to the temperature, but only operates between predefined temperatures at 25 and 50 degrees. Manual mode allows you to turn on the fan at maximum speed only. This is useful in humid environments where it is ideal to keep the fan running constantly even when the temperatures drop at night.

Key Features:

  • Electronic Temperature Control: Automatically adjusts fan speeds based on internal temperature for optimal efficiency.
  • Easy Installation: Hassle-free setup. Simple design for plug-and-play.
  • Compact and Powerful: Small footprint with high-performance fans.
  • Durable Construction: Made form high quality materials. Built to last.
  • Versatile Application: Suitable for various fridge types and can be used in power control spaces.

Product Name: Brunner Vento 12V NG 92 Dual Fridge Fan
Product Description:
Brunner Vento 12V NG (Next Generation) 92 Dual Fridge Fan

Brunner Vento Dual Fridge Fan for Motorhome, Caravan and Campervan

The Brunner Vento NG 92 Dual Fridge Fan is the perfect tool you need for controlling the temperature of your mobile home's fridge. As your fridge operates, it releases hot air which builds up and makes your fridge work harder to stay cool. In your Motorhome, Campervan and Caravan, you can install this handy fridge fan with its simple installation, see paper instructions included or visit below to view installation instructions online. The use of the Brunner Vento Fridge Fan can assist your fridge by redirecting the hot air through the wall vents behind your fridge. By removing the hot air form behind your fridge, your fridge can perform more efficiently as it can cool down easier and is not being overwhelmed by the heat in the area outside of the fridge.

 

Installation cannot be easier. The Brunner Vento Next Generation Fridge Fan can be installed in your mobile home, behind the upper fridge vent for maximum efficiency. Simply connect the Brunner Vento Fan to 12V of power using the connectors provided. Connections between the fan itself, thermostat and the control panel are plug and play for ease of installation. Brackets for fitting the fan are provided.

 

The Brunner Vento Electronic Fridge Fan has two modes; Auto and Manual. Auto mode automatically operates adjusting the speed of the fan according to the temperature. Manual mode allows your to control the speed of the fan yourself. This feature can be useful in humid environments where it is ideal to keep the fan running constantly even when the temperatures drop at night.

Key Features:

  • Dual Fan Technology: Two powerful fans built in for maximum airflow and heat dissipation.
  • Temperature Sensor: Intelligent technology allows control for automatic fan speed adjustment.
  • Easy Installation: Hassle-free setup. Simple design for plug-and-play, with included mounting brackets and cables.
  • Durable Construction: Made from high quality materials, built to last.
  • Versatile Application: Suitable for various fridge types and can be used in power control spaces.

Product Description:
Easy Camp Hamra 4 Tent

Four Man Family Tunnel Tent

The Easy Camp Hamra tent is a spacious tunnel tent ideal for families. It features a spacious living area with room for cooking and and camping relaxation. At 180cm the living area allows adults to stand upright. Inside there are useful storage pockets, a mains electric hook up cable entry, lantern hanging points and a large window with toggle back curtains.

The Hamra 4 sleeps four comfortably and has a removable dividing wall for privacy, and storage pockets to stow torches and mobile phones. The Sleep Tight inner bedroom tent has darkened walls and ceiling to reduce light in the early evening and morning to ensure a good nights sleep. Rear ventilation panels can be fully opened or covered up to adjust airflow.

The Easy Camp Hamra camping tent has lots of ventilation to keep your family cool on hot days. A rear ventilation panel and mesh door panels ensure good air circulation. A sewn in ground-sheet to keep out drafts and insects make it the perfect choice for any camping adventure. With a pitching time of just 6-10 minutes you'll have plenty of time to enjoy your next camping trip!

Easy Camp Hamra Tent Features:

  • Sewn-in groundsheet
  • Large side entrance door with full mesh door
  • Side window with toggle up curtains
  • Front entrance mesh panels 
  • Organiser pockets in living area and bedroom
  • Mains hook-up access
  • Colour coded poles and sleeve

Easy Camp Hamra 4 Specification:

  • Taping: Taped seams
  • Poles: Endura Flex, fibreglass 11/12.5 mm
  • Material Flysheet: 100% Polyester Inner tent: 100%
