Easy Camp Skarvan 4 Family Tent

4 Berth Quick Pitch Tunnel Tent

Enjoy family camping in comfort with the Easy Camp Skarvan 4 tent. This spacious and practical tunnel tent has three zones; a generous living area, sleeping area for four and a rain-safe canopy. Product Name: Outwell Backroads Awning Room for Campervans
Product Description:
Outwell Backroads Awning Camp Room

Campervan Awning for VW T6 or Similar

The latest awning from Outwell is the versatile Backroads Awning. This camp room style awning is a great way to create extra living space, storage or a private shelter while on your travels. The Outwell Backroads awning features large tinted windows on both sides to let in natural light, protect against sun glare and ensure you make the most of any views while maintaining privacy inside. Inside, the toggle up curtains you can let in as much or as little light as needed. Outside, toggle back side panels give shelter from the wind or can be folded back for greater views from your campervan awning. The front panel can be used with a set of king poles (optional extra) to create a sun canopy on sunny days.

 

The Outwell Backroads awning is specifically designed for a range of campervans including the VW T5, T6, T6.1 (Multivan, Caravelle, Transporter, California), Mercedes Vito, Marco Polo and similar sized van conversions.

Versatile Campervan Awning to fit Fiamma or Thule Wind Out Awnings

Designed to fit a range of wind-out awnings including Fiamma, Thule and Dometic the Outwell Backroads Awning Room is quick and easy to attach and take down giving you more time to enjoy your holiday. All three awning panels can be used alone so that it can be used to create a simple sun canopy shade or a complete awning camp room. The Outwell Backroads Awning conveniently packs down into two compact sized bags which can be stored in the tailgate of a VW California campervan alongside its chairs.

Outwell Backroads Awning Features:

  • Designed for: VW T5, T6, MB Vito and similar sized campervans
  • Large tinted side windows
  • Fast and easy set-up
  • Pre-attached luminous guy lines
  • Adjustable pegging points

Outwell Backroads Camp Room Specification:

  • Type of awning: Annex
  • Roof connection length: 240 cm
  • Attachment height: 175 - 200 cm
  • Bead thickness: 7 mm / 5 mm
  • UV protection: UPF 30+
  • Waterproof: Hydrostatic Head 4000 mm
  • Flysheet: 100% Polyester
  • Weight: 4.3 kg
  • Pack size: 45 x 33 x 6 & 45 x 33 x 10 cm

Optional Extras:

  • King Poles (sold separately)
  • Southwell awning carpet 250 x 200cm  (sold separately)

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Deluxe Tech Storm Kit
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Deluxe Tech Storm Kit

Ultimate Stability for Your Camping Adventures

The Outdoor Revolution Deluxe Tech Storm Kit includes everything needed to securely anchor your caravan awning, drive-away awning or family tent in stormy or awkward conditions, aiding the pitching process and providing peace of mind in all terrains. Packed in a robust plastic carry case with an ergonomic handle, this kit combines ease of transport with ultimate functionality making it an essential choice for the seasoned, weather-savvy adventurer.

The Outdoor Revolution Deluxe Tech Storm Kit includes:

  • Curved Mallet – An ergonomic, non-slip weighted rubber mallet, crafted to assist in driving pegs securely, even at inconvenient angles.
  • Endurance Storm Straps – Two reflective, heavy-duty adjustable tensioning straps for added stability and support during adverse weather, keeping your setup steady.
  • Tech Pegs – A boxed set of fifteen durable hard ground pegs, designed with a tough double-sided peg head to grip firmly on hard ground, anchoring guy lines and peg points securely.
  • Peg Cleaner – An integral brush on the storage box, maximizing the longevity and functionality of the Tech Pegs by easily removing dirt and debris.

The Outdoor Revolution Deluxe Tech Storm Kit is the ultimate solution for seasoned outdoor enthusiasts, designed to ensure stability and peace of mind for those camping or touring in any weather condition.

Product Name: Outdoor Revolution Campese Duo Two Seat Sofa and Chair Set
Product Description:
Outdoor Revolution Campese Duo Two Seat Sofa and Chair Set

Elevate your outdoor experience with the Campese Duo Two Seat Sofa and Chair Set

The Campese Duo Two Seat Sofa and Chair Set is the perfect blend of comfort, style, and practicality for your family tent, caravan awning, or driveaway. Crafted for those who seek a home-like atmosphere while adventuring outdoors, this set includes a two-seat inflatable sofa and an armchair, offering unbeatable value without compromising on quality. Inspired by the original Campese model, the Duo features a lower seating position, enhancing stability for a more comfortable and secure seating experience. Constructed with a durable 300D polyester fabric cover, the set is reinforced with a tough PVC base, making it ideal for outdoor use, even on grass. The wipeable fabric ensures easy cleaning, while the tough PVC inner bladder provides optimal strength and rigidity, so you can relax just like you would in your living room. For added convenience, the Campese Duo includes a handy side pocket, perfect for storing magazines, mobile phones, or other small essentials. Inflate the set effortlessly using the included access ports in the fabric, compatible with either a manual hand pump or an electric air pump (we recommend the Outdoor Revolution Rechargeable USB Air Pump for best results).

Campese Duo Two Seat Sofa and Chair Set Features:

  • Inner Bladders: Two internal PVC bladders with individual inflation points for customizable firmness.
  • Fabric: 300D polyester with PE coating for durability and comfort.
  • Easy Inflation: Compatible with manual or electric pumps.
  • Convenience: Side pocket for storing small items.
  • Carry Bag: Comes with a handy polyester drawstring bag for easy transport.

Product Name: Easy Camp Lom Tri Sun Canopy
Product Description:
Easy Camp Lom Tri Sun Canopy

A versatile awning made to fit the VW T5 T6 Campervan series

Transform your outdoor space with the Easy Camp Lom Tri Sun Canopy. Configure three triangular panels to offer shade and weather protection in multiple configurations, even peg the panels down to create a windbreak!

The Lom Tri is designed to fit the Volkswagen T5/T6 range of campervans, but with a height range of 150-260cm, the Lom Tri will fit most campervan models. Slide the 5mm/7mm beading channel into your awning rail for quick set-up. The canopy comes with velcro tabs to attach to roof rails, or guy lines to throw over the top of your campervan if needed.

The material is a lightweight polyester with a waterproof rating of 3000mm, ideal for keeping you dry while relaxing or having lunch under your awning. The three included poles can be adjusted to suit height requirements, and the entire canopy packs away into a small carry bag when no longer needed.

Lom Tri Canopy Features

  • Comprised of three triangular panels that can be zipped together in multiple configurations
  • Attaches to the vehicle via dual beadings, hook & loop tabs, or guy lines over the roof
  • Creates shade or shelter in various configurations
  • Includes three height-adjustable poles 
  • Taped seams

Easy Camp Sun Canopy Specifications

  • Roof connection length: 250 cm
  • Attachment height: 150 - 260 cm
  • Bead thickness: 5/7 mm
  • Flysheet: WeatherGuard 3000, 185T polyester PU coated, fire retardant
  • Hydrostatic Head: 3000 mm
  • Weight: 3.6 kg
  • Composition: 100% Polyester
  • Pack size: 76 x 12 cm
  • Poles: Steel, 19 mm

Product Name: CBE NE273 Complete Caravan, Campervan and Motorhome System
Product Description:
CBE NE273 Complete Caravan, Campervan and Motorhome System

Effortless Monitoring and Control for Your Campervan, Caravan, and Motorhome Systems

The CBE NE273 Power Control System is a complete digital solution designed to streamline the management of your campervan, caravan, or motorhome's key functions. Equipped with a 7-inch full-color touch control panel, it offers clear and intuitive controls for monitoring batteries, water tanks, temperatures, and more. This system integrates advanced technology, including an electronic battery separator and fuse protection, ensuring safe and efficient operation. Its compact design and reliable performance make it ideal for modern campervan, caravan, and motorhome setups.

NE273 Complete Power Control System Features:

  • Battery Monitoring: Tests and displays the condition of both car and service batteries (voltage and graphics).
  • Water Tank Management: Monitors drinking water tank levels and provides alarms for full wastewater tanks.
  • Integrated Controls: Operates a 3-way fridge and manages car battery recharging.
  • Additional Functions: Includes a digital clock, internal/external temperature readings, and adjustable screen brightness.
  • Safety Features: Built-in fuse protection and battery-saving functions.

System Components:

  • Control Panel NE273 
  • 12V Distribution Box with 13 Fuses 
  • Drinking Water Tank Probe
  • Waste Water Tank Probe 
  • Cables for Probes and Temperature Sensors (up to 8m).

The CBE NE273 Power Control System is the ideal solution for your campervan, caravan, or motorhome, offering easy management of essential systems. With advanced features and reliable performance, it ensures a smooth, hassle-free experience on any journey. Travel with confidence, knowing your vehicle's systems are running efficiently and safely

Product Availability: The CBE NE273 Complete Caravan System is available on a next day courier service!

Product Description:
Outwell Oberon Colour Changing Camping Lamp

Portable and Rechargeable LED Camping Lantern

The Outwell Camping Lamp is a unique camping light that is perfect for all your outdoor adventures. The colour changing Outwell Oberon Camping Lantern offers five lighting colour options to create an ambiance in your tent, caravan or motorhome. The multicolour feature of the Outwell Oberon Camping Lamp can change between a warm white, purple, blue, green, and red. The frosted dome omits a light that is bright but not too overbearing. Automatically cycle through colours or set a constant colour to your liking.

 

The Oberon Camping Light is a stylish modern lamp that adds an ambient element to your camping setup. Useful both outdoor and indoor, this portable colour changing lamp is ideal for any camping adventure. The Outwell Oberon LED Camping Light is fully rechargeable.

 

To adjust the LED colour, press the power button to toggle through the light modes:

  1. Warm white (high)
  2. Warm white (low)
  3. RGB (changing)
  4. RGB (constant)

Oberon Camping Lamp Key Features:

  • Dimmable Lighting: Dimmer function to control light intensity
  • Energy Efficient: Rechargeable, USB-C input
  • Unique Lighting: Warm white + RGB LED's
  • Durable Materials: IPP44 rating, dust and slash proof

The Robens Munros Rechargeable Camping Lantern is an ideal lighting solution for your camping adventures. The Munros Camping Light comes complete with carabiner and carry handle, so you'll be able to hang this lantern to the roof of your tent. 

 

The classic design of this rechargeable lantern gives your camping setup a rustic feel. The Robens camping lantern features a dimming function along with four different lighting modes, allowing you to adjust the lighting to your needs. The size and weight of the Munros Lantern makes it incredible portable, ideal for camping at night.

 

To adjust the light colour, press the power button additional times to toggle through the four different light modes, press and hold for dimming of any light mode:

  1. White light
  2. Warm yellow light (SMD)
  3. White light (SMD)
  4. White light + White light (SMD) - 1 + 3 combined

Munros Camping Lantern Key Features:

  • Adjustable Lighting: Featuring a dimming function, allowing you to adjust the brightness of the lantern.
  • Rechargeable Batteries: Batteries last for approximately 3-6 hours. USB to USB-C charging cable included, built-in indicator for when battery gets low.
  • Changeable Colours: Choose between cool white, warm yellow, and mixed.
  • Hangable: Comes equipped with a hanging hook and carabiner included.
  • Durable Materials: IPX4 rating, weather resistant.

Product Description:
Eberspacher Airtronic D2L Diesel Air Space Heater with EasyStart Control Panel for Ford Transit Custom Campervan

Diesel Campervan Air Heater with Internal/External Mounting Bracket

Complete with an internal mounting plate, the Airtronic D2L diesel air space heater by Eberspacher is ideal for use in your campervan or as supplementary heating in your motor home. Being diesel powered makes the Airtronic D2L extremely practical for both availability of fuel and use off-grid. A popular choice for air space heating, the Airtronic D2L allows you to heat your living space without running the engine which means no more defrosting of windows your campervan or motorhome. The Airtronic D2L Air Space Heater is ideal for your Ford Transit Custom, excavator, cab, truck, tractor, lorry, or HGV.

 

Compact, efficient and programmable!

Both compact and fuel efficient with fast heat-up times, the Airtronic D2L diesel air space heater is practical and economical. The Airtronic D2L is fully programmable using the new Eberspacher EasyStart Pro control panel. The EasyStart Pro control panel is also compatible with the Eberspacher EasyStart Web which allows control via the internet, smartphone apps, or even a smartwatch!

 

The Airtronic D2L is suitable for most environments!

With the ability to operate in both marine and road environments, at temperatures as low as -40°C and at altitudes as high as 3,000m (~9800ft), Eberspacher have ensured the Airtronic D2L is as flexible as possible and can be used anywhere you go.

Product Description:
The Outwell Parton Windscreen

Pop-Up Camping Windbreak:

The Outwell Parton Pop Up Windscreen is a compact, lightweight and easy-to-use windbreak designed to provide wind protection and privacy for camping and caravan owners. With clear panels providing unobstructed views of your surroundings you won't miss out on the beautiful scenery on your camping adventures. The Outwell Parton Windscreen has a rapid-pitch system with poles that are pre-connected allowing for quick and effortless setup. The Outwell Parton Windscreen is also constructed from high-quality Outtex 3000 Select Polyester offering excellent weather resistance, protecting you from wind, rain and sun, ensuring a comfortable and enjoyable camping experience.

Outwell Parton Windscreen Features:

  • Rapid setup: Pre-connected poles and screen for fast assembly.
  • Semi-freestanding design: Flexible positioning for various terrains.
  • Clear panels: Unobstructed views of the surroundings.
  • Durable materials: Weather-resistant polyester for long-lasting use.
  • Compact and lightweight: Easy to transport and store.
  • Size: L500 x H125 cm  
  • Packed size: 107 x 12 x 12 cm  
  • Weight: 4.15 kg

Product Description:
Blue Diamond 7 Pole Windbreak 

Traditional 18ft Stripe Windscreen

The Blue Diamond 7 Pole Windbreak is a traditionally styled windbreak. Constructed from heavy-duty lock-stitch polypropylene canvas, this windbreak is both durable and weather-resistant. In addition to the stylish stripe design, it provides privacy and excellent protection from the wind around you, your tent or your awning. The rot-proof, high-quality, material ensures long-lasting performance, even in challenging conditions. It features an awning channel for caravan attachment. This Blue Diamond windbreak utilises seven soft wood poles equipped with metal spikes on the end for use on hard ground and a metal ferule on the opposite end to prevent damage to the pole. This combination provides both stability and effortless setup, allowing you to quickly create a sheltered and private space.

This traditional windbreak is perfect for creating a sheltered and private space at campsites, beaches, or in your own garden.

Blue Diamond 7 Pole Windbreak Features:

  • 7 wooden poles with metal spikes.  
  • Privacy and wind protection.
  • Easy assembly.
  • Open Dimensions: 121cm x 549cm (H x W)
  • Pack Size: 150 x 11 x 11cm
  • Weight: 11kg

Product Name: Outwell Pine Hills Drive Away Awning 175-200cm
Product Description:
Outwell Pine Hills Awning

Drive-Away Awning for VW T6 or Similar Campervan 175-200cm

Outwell's new range of drive away awnings offer quality and a good range of features at an affordable price. The Outwell Pine Hills drive-away awning is quick and easy to pitch and comes in a compact bag making it an essential part of your campervan kit. With its classic dome shape it has good head height throughout, plenty of living space for a table and chairs or gear storage and the option of adding a bedroom inner tent (sold separately). The Outwell Pine Hills awning also features a large canopy over the front entrance to keep rain out. A full mesh door also means you can keep the awning vented on sunny days without letting bugs in. A Dual Kador tunnel fits both static and wind-out awning rails.

 

The Outwell Pine Hills is ideally suited to couples or small families needing additional storage space or an awning that can be adapted to include sleeping space for friends. The lightweight fabric and compact carry bag make it handy for short-term adventures and weekend getaways. With a connection height of 175-200cm it is designed to fit VW T5, T6 or similar sized campervans.

 

The new Roam Collection of driveaway awnings from Outwell are designed to withstand challenging weather conditions. Product Description:
Vango Tahoe 400/500 Dome Tent

A compact yet spacious 4 and 5 man poled tent

The Vango Tahoe 400 and 500 tents are spacious dome tents in versions for 4 or 5 people. Whether you're planning a weekend camping trip or an extended break, the Tahoe range is packed with features to enhance your camping experience. Its spacious porch area, complete with a linked-in groundsheet, provides ample storage for gear and creates a sheltered outdoor living space. The darkened bedroom fabric ensures a peaceful night's sleep by helping to reduce early morning light and the Queen-size space is well suited to families and taller campers looking for extra space. The large vents promote airflow and reduce condensation. Additionally, Vango's tents feature lantern hanging points, bedroom pockets, and a carry bag. The Tahoe's diamond-clear windows offer excellent visibility and natural light.

The latest Tahoe tent from Vango are created using ColourLok Eco solution-dyed fabric, a sustainable manufacturing process that significantly reduces water consumption and CO2 emissions. In addition, this eco-conscious technology enhances the fabric’s UV resistance, and helps maintain the vibrant colour for many seasons of camping. The colour-coded PowerFlex Fibreglass poles are lightweight, strong, and easy to assemble giving you more time to enjoy the great outdoors. 

The Vango Tahoe 400 tent is ideal for couples looking for a compact yet comfortable living and sleeping space, perfect for lightweight, weekend camping and festivals. Alternatively, the Vango Tahoe 500 is perfect for small families or larger groups, featuring extra space for socialising, gear storage, and relaxation, making it the ideal choice for your camping adventure.

Vango Tahoe Tent Features:

  • Darkened bedroom material to give a better nights sleep
  • Large vents to improve airflow and reduce condensation
  • Fire retardant fabric meets EU EN5912 safety standard
  • Linked-in detachable, waterproof groundsheet
  • Bug-mesh on front door
  • Lantern hanging points
  • Diamond clear windows
  • Bedroom pockets
  • Queen size bedroom
  • Fully taped seams

Product Description:
Vango Tacoma 400 & 800XL Poled Tent 

Spacious Family Tent and Footprint Package

Based on the classic vis-à-vis design the Vango Tacoma Tent is a spacious and versatile family tent that offers a comfortable and practical camping experience. With its innovative Sentinel Dynamic-Weave fabric and a high hydrostatic head, the Tacoma provides excellent protection against the elements. The spacious living area, separate sleeping compartments, and numerous features like darkened bedrooms and cable entry points make it ideal for families and groups of all sizes. Whether you're heading to a festival, campsite, or a scout camp, the Tacoma Tent is the perfect choice for a memorable outdoor adventure

The Tacoma are large family tents designed for campers seeking privacy, space and comfort. The Vango Tacoma 400 and 800XL tents feature a large central living area ideal for family dining, socialising and relaxing. For even more living space, an optional side awning can be attached to provide additional shelter or a storage area. Large Diamond-clear windows that let natural light fill the area. When night falls, the windows have roll-down curtains for privacy. There are two main access doors giving you the flexibility to choose your entrance in adverse weather. Roll away the external doors to create an airy living area, with bug nets on both doors to keep insects out. These doors can be converted into a sun canopy with the addition of king poles, providing a shaded area to enjoy the outdoors. 

Vis-a-Vis Bedroom Layout 

The unique design allows each queen-size bedroom to have their own space and privacy on opposite sides of the tent. The midnight bedrooms have a darkening internal fabric to ensure you have a restful nights sleep, even during the Summer. They feature storage pockets to keep your valuables safe in one place.

Vango Tacoma Features

  • Vango AirZone provide high and low level ventilation for improved air circulation.
  • Drop down door step creates easy access for pram and wheelchairs.
  • Fully sewn-in, waterproof groundsheet to keep bugs and draughts at bay.
  • Mesh doors on both living room doors for bug-free ventilation
  • Cable entry points in each bedroom with cable tidies.
  • Fully taped seams to provide a watertight seal.
  • Darkened bedrooms with storage pockets.
  • Waterproof rating of 4,000mm HH.
  • Diamond clear windows with toggled curtains
  • Strong fibreglass poles.
  • Lantern hanging points.
  • Fully wind and rain tested to standard EN ISO 5912. 
  • Fire retardant fabrics meet European EN5912 safety standards.
  • Toggled inner bedroom divider allows you to split bedrooms for privacy (800XL version only)

Product Description:
Outwell Talladega Air Awning

Drive-Away Campervan Awning for VW T6 or similar sized vans

Experience the freedom of the open road with the Talladega Air drive-away awning. This drive-away air awning features a spacious living area with large tinted windows which fill the awning with natural light while maintaining some privacy. The front canopy offers shade on lazy sunny days and shelter on rainy days. Easy access is provided through front and side doors. With the addition of mesh doors to three sides the Talladega benefits from great ventilation and allows you to make the most of great views from your campervan. Multiple cable entry points allow you to attach power sources without compromising on safety.

The optional inner bedroom tent makes this awning ideally suited to small families or friends on a campervan adventure. The dark inner tent ensures better sleep quality in the morning and early evening. Customise your awning even more with the Talladega Air Footprint and Cosy Carpet.

Outwell Talladega Air Low Drive Away Awning is designed to fit VW T6 or similarly sized campervans. Outwell awnings work with both UK and Euro campers and will fit either side of the vehicle due to its modular cowl design. The Drive Away Ready System simplifies connecting and disconnecting the tent to the vehicle, ensuring seamless transitions between adventures.

Customise your awning with the addition of a range of optional extras. Recommended extras are the Talladega Air Footprint and Cosy Carpet.

Outwell Talladega Air Features:

  • Removeable Access Zone for flexible orientation of the awning in relation to the vehicle
  • Two large side doors with insect-proof mesh screen backing
  • Vertical front wall with canopy
  • Pre-shaped air tubes provide great headroom and interior space
  • Double zips allow full front opening, backed by full mesh panel for bug-free ventilation
  • Spacious living area with large tinted windows for a light-filled interior
  • Toggle-up curtains for privacy
  • Hook Track System for versatile positioning of lights and items up to 1.5kg
  • Heavy duty Outwell zips are easy to use, running securely and freely
  • Optional dark-fabric inner bedroom for sleep or storage
  • Sewn-in groundsheet

 Talladega Awning Specification:

Kick off your campervan adventure with this complete awning, carpet and footprint bundle from Kampa!

The Kampa Action awning is a lightweight, poled drive-away awning designed for VW T6 or similar campervans with a low connection height of 180-210cm. It has a highly practical layout and features a spacious living area, ideal for dining and relaxing or as additional storage. It can be transformed into extra sleeping accommodation for guests with an option clip-in inner bedroom tent. There are full height windows with curtains, allowing you to make the most of the views while maintaining privacy. The large protective front canopy helps keep rain out on wet days.

This easy to pitch drive-away awning can be pitched in around 14 minutes giving you more time to enjoy your campervan adventure. The Kampa Action awning is ideal for weekend camping and extended stays!

Product Name: Dometic TwinBoost Combi Gas Electric Motorhome Heater
Product Description:
Dometic TwinBoost Combi Gas/Electric Motorhome Heaters

Campervan Motorhome Air & Water Furnace

The Dometic TwinBoost Gas/Electric Air Heaters are campervan and motorhome heaters for cabin air and hot water. Available in a variety of options, including LPG gas only and and gas/electrical functionality. Options include; 4000W gas only, 6000W gas only, 4000W/1800W gas + electric, and the 6000W/1800W gas + electric. These gas driver or gas/electric driver heaters have two separate heating chambers for your campervan and motorhome's cabin air and for hot water. The Dometic TwinBoost Heater can heat water and air simultaneously or independently, allowing you to get warm water without the need to heat the whole campervan. This impressive heater ensure you have a warm winter and functions perfectly in the summer for warm water.

 

Save energy with the Dometic Twin Boost Heater with its economic use of energy. Programmable time setting function for adjusting when you want hot water in your campervan or motorhome. Save money by turning off the heat when you're not going to be in! The dual chamber design of the Dometic TwinBoost Gas/Electric Heater also allows for energy and money savings. By allowing water to be heated directly, rather than via the air heating. Reducing the air heating used and allowing you to save money on your energy bill.

 

Dometic Twin Boost Heater Key Features:

  • 2-in-1 Unit: Heats up the cabin air and the 10L hot water tank simultaneously or independently.
  • 4 Warm Air Outlets: Uniform heat distribution throughout your caravans/motorhomes cabin.
  • Intrusive Control Panel: Easy operation and many programming options.
  • Smart Chimney Cover Design: Repels water away from the wall.
  • 3-in-1 Safety System: Features a frost, drain and over-pressure valve.
  • Simple Display: Easy to read and well structured design.
  • Cabin Vent Mode: Ventilation function without operating air heater.
  • Independ Air and Water Heating: Save on energy by only heating air and water when needed.
  • Electric Heating: On the electric heating models only, 1800W electric power is used for water heating.

Poled Awning for VW T5 T6 or similar sized campervans

The Kampa Trip is a compact, lightweight, poled drive away awning. This quick pitch campervan awning is fast to set-up and take-down so that you can make the most of your campervan adventure, even when touring solo. The Kampa Trip awning can be attached to you van by attaching the velcro straps to a roof rack, throwing the guy ropes over the top, using an optional pole and clamp kit to fix it to a gutter or using a fixing kit into a rail. This great value package deal includes an awning, carpet and footprint. 

Kampa Trip poled awning is suitable for campervans with a rail height of 180 to 210cm

Product Description:
Vango Savannah 400 Tent Package

4 Person Family Tent and Footprint Bundle

The Savannah 400 is the latest 4-person family tent from Vango. It is a spacious and versatile family tent, perfect for camping adventures. With a roomy living area and separate sleeping compartments, it offers comfortable accommodation for up to four people. The Vango Savannah 400 is a quick-pitch poled tent which can be pitched in around 18 minutes making it ideal for family camping, festivals and weekend getaways.

Featuring an extended living area the Vango Savannah poled tent has ample space for relaxing, dining and storage. It has a waterproof, sewn-in groundsheet to keep out bugs and draughts, handy hanging lantern points and electric hook-up access points. The Vango Savannah tent range features large, diamond clear windows to make the most of the views and let in plenty of natural light and toggled curtains for privacy. Several strategically placed ventilation points help keep the tent fresh and airy while reducing the risk of condensation. 

The extended front porch can be fully enclosed making a versatile space for all weathers, whether it be a shaded spot for relaxing on sunny days, shelter from the rain or an enclosed space for storing your camping gear. The large front door can be unzipped to the midpoint, or fully across, giving a good variety of options to suit different conditions and uses. 

The Vango Savannah tent has two spacious king size double bedrooms which feature midnight fabric. The premium darkened fabric enhances sleep by reducing light in the evening and early morning. It's king size bedrooms fit 4 people comfortably.

The Savannah Poled Tents feature Vango’s innovative Sentinel Dynamic Weave fabric, blending 70D and 100D threads for enhanced strength and durability while remaining lightweight. This fabric offers dependable performance when camping in all weathers.

Savannah 400 4-Man Tent Package Features:

  • Diamond clear windows to maximise light
  • PowerFlex lightweight and durable fibreglass poles
  • Colour coded poles for easy set-up
  • Additional groundsheet protector to protect and extend the life of your tent
  • SkyTrack II hanging system to easily attach lighting and storage
  • ColourLok Eco fabric for colour retention and UV protection
  • Hanging lantern points
  • Electric-hook-up access point
  • Additional footprint to prevent damage to your groundsheet

Vango Savannah 400 Specification:

  • Pitching time: 18 mins
  • Waterproof rating: 4000 mm
  • Dimensions: L600 x H205 x W300 cm
  • Weight: 21.6 kg
  • Pack size: L80 x H36 x W36 cm

Product Name: Streetwize E-Move 203 Manual Engage Caravan Motor Mover
Product Description:
Streetwize E-Move EM203 Manual Engage Caravan Motor Mover

Remote Control Caravan Motor Mover

The Streetwize E-Move Manual Engage Caravan Motor Mover is an easy to operate caravan mover motor. The E-Move EM203 is a chain driven motor that allows you to adjust the position of your caravan without the hassle of hitching it up to your car. This motor mover saves you a lot of time, allowing you to easily manoeuvre your caravan in any direction you want. This Caravan Motor Mover is ideal for parking your caravan in the exact place you want it, perfect for tight squeezes! The included remote control can be used to move your caravan in any direction, including backwards and forwards and left and right. This is the perfect tool for parking your caravan quickly and efficiently.

 

The E-Move EM203 features a durable alloy roller that grips to your caravan tyre. This Caravan Mover is suitable for both single and double axle caravans, with double axle caravans requiring two motors. The E-Move EM203 supports a maximum total weight of 1800kg. Manual Engage is required for operation, using included winding handle. This E-Move Caravan Motor Mover supports a maximum total weight 1800kg (1600kg on 18% upward slope).

 

PLEASE NOTE: Do not user rechargeable PP3 batteries when using the handset. It is only compatible with NON-RECHARGEABLE ONLY

 

EM203 Caravan Motor Mover Key Features:

  • Manual Engage
  • Chain driven motor mover
  • Easily manoeuvrable campervan
  • Remote control operation
  • Durable alloy rollers
  • Single and double axle compatibility
  • Remote control and winding handle included

Remote Control Caravan Motor Mover

The Streetwize E-Move Manual Engage Caravan Motor Mover is an easy to operate caravan mover motor. The E-Move EM313 is a soft start gear driven motor that allows you to adjust the position of your caravan without the hassle of hitching it up to your car. Product Name: Leisurewize Mini Dehumidifier for Campervans and Caravans
Product Description:
Leisurewize Compact Electric Campervan Dehumidifier

Low Wattage Mini Dehumidifier

The Leisurewize Compact Electric Dehumidifier is ideal for your motorhome, campervan and campervan. Using this compact humidifier, reduce mould growth and purify the air in your motorhome, keeping your motorhome fresh and moisture-free. Quietly remove the moisture build up in your campervan using this Compact Electric Dehumidifier, with its low wattage power consumption, this mini dehumidifier operates quietly. This dehumidifier efficiently removes up to 400ml of moisture daily.

 

The Leisurewize Compact Electric Humidifier has a capacity to hold 1.3L of water, stored in an easily removeable tank. When full, the Electric dehumidifier will automatically switch off, preventing wasted power consumption. The Leisurewize Compact Electric Dehumidifier can prevent mould and mildew buildup, and can reduce odours, condensation, rust and peeling surfaces. Ideally used in bathrooms and kitchen, but also suitable for wardrobes and bedrooms where moisture can easily build up. To set up, simply plug your Mini Dehumidifier into a plug socket/mains power supply.

 

Mini Electric Dehumidifier Key Features:

  • Extracts up to 400ml of water everyday
  • Features a 1.3L removable water tank with auto shut off technology
  • Operates at a low wattage of just 48W
  • Easy to move and ideal for small spaces

Product Description:
Vango Sierra Air 300 3-Person Tent

Quick-pitch Inflatable Tent Ideal for Couples Camping 

The Vango Sierra 300 is a versatile 3-person tent designed for comfort and convenience. It features a spacious living area with a flat front design, maximizing usable space within the tent. The pre-attached front canopy provides additional shelter and creates a great area for dining and relaxation, offering an enhanced camping experience.

The King Size Midnight Bedrooms offer ample space for each person, promoting a restful night's sleep. Made from premium, darkened fabric the inner bedroom tents reduce light in the evening and early morning so you can enjoy better sleep after a day of adventure!

The tent is constructed with durable Sentinel Fabric, keeping pack size and weight low while ensuring Vango's renowned quality and durability. Multiple mesh panels are incorporated throughout the tent, including an additional mesh panel behind the bedrooms, to optimize ventilation and keep the tent cool during warm weather.

The Vango Sierra 300 is an excellent choice for weekend camping trips, offering a balance of comfort, convenience, and durability. Pitched in as little as 10 minutes so that you can make the most of your time camping.

Sierra Air 300 Features:

  • Diamond Clear Windows - maximise light and visibility to provide a bright and airy environment
  • Lantern Hanging Points - conveniently positioned to attach your lighting
  • Waterproof PE Groundsheet - robust and hardwearing fabric to stand up to the rigours of the most active campers
  • Easy Pack Carry Bag - oversized carry bag made from 15% more material with 50% more volume
  • Fully Taped Seams - all flysheet seams are factory taped which provides a watertight seal
  • Sentinel Fabric - When pack size and weight are the key factors in choosing your tent, our specifically designed Sentinel Fabric will surpass your needs
  • Colour Lok Eco - increases colour retention and protection against UV light
  • Inflatable AirBeam Structure - quick pitch, strong and rigid structure. Supplied with Air Beam pump
  • Midnight King Size Bedrooms - Premium darkened fabric and a generous 70cm sleeping area per person, ensures a more comfortable sleep

Product Description:
Streetwize Portable Spin Dryer

Low Wattage Compact Dryer for Caravan and Motorhome

The Leisurewize Campervan Portable Spin Dryer is the perfect portable dryer for your campervan, caravan and motorhome. Easy to take with you on your travels, this portable dryer is ideal for caravan holidays and travelling in a motorhome. This compact, low-wattage dryer spins its stainless steel drum at a maximum speed of 2800 RPM, effectively removing water from your laundry and significantly reducing drying time. The small design of this dryer makes is easy to fit into small spaces, making it the perfect travel companion. Quickly dry your wet clothes with this amazing Spin Dryer from Leisurewize.

 

The Leisurewize Campervan Spin Dryer is also useful as a backup in case your home dryer breaks, however it is best suited for touring caravans and big motorhomes because of its portable and compact design. So whether you're travelling or need a reliable backup at home, the Streetwize Portable Spin Dryer is the perfect solution for convenient laundry drying.

 

Spin Dryer Key Features:

  • Portable Slimline design - ideal for small spaces, including touring caravans and big motorhomes
  • Stainless steel drum which is hard wearing and durable, ensuring reliability and a long lifespan
  • Smart gravity-assisted drainage
  • Holds a large capacity of laundry, up to 6kg
  • Operates at a low wattage, helping to reduce energy consumption and save energy
  • Packaged Dimensions 70cm x 37.5cm x 37.5cm

Product Description:
Vango Arden Tailgate Awning 

Quick Pitch Campervan and SUV Tailgate Tent

The Vango Arden Tailgate Awning is a compact and lightweight awning designed for rear attachment to low campervans and SUVs. It's perfect for couples and independent travellers who want a quick and easy setup for short stops or touring adventures. With multiple attachment methods and adjustable width and height, only one pole is needed for set-up giving you more time to enjoy your outdoor adventure.

Overall, the Vango Arden Tailgate Awning is a practical and convenient option for campervan and SUV owners who want to extend their camping experience without the hassle of a large awning.

Vango Arden Tailgate Tent Features:

  • Diamond clear windows with privacy curtains: maximise natural light
  • Mesh front door: for bug-free ventilation
  • Compact and lightweight: weighing only 7.9kg, it's easy to transport and store
  • Versatile attachment: it can be attached to the rear or side of your vehicle, with adjustable height and width options
  • Quick and easy setup: the single PowerFlex fiberglass pole makes pitching a breeze
  • Durable and weatherproof: made from Vango's Sentinel Active 75D fabric with taped seams for maximum weather protection
  • Comfortable living space: includes a mesh front door, large side door with mesh screen, and a window blind for privacy and ventilation
  • Included groundsheet: provides protection from the elements and creates a clean living space.  

Vango Arden Awning Specification:

  • Pitching time: 5 mins
  • Weight: 7.9kg
  • Kador height: 180-210 cm 
  • Pack size: L55.0 x H22.0 x W24.0cm
  • Waterproof: HH 3000mm

Product Description:
Vango Sierra Air 500 5-Person Tent

Quick Pitch Inflatable Airbeam Tent

The Vango Sierra 500 Air is perfect for small families or those wanting extra space for extended camping breaks. Divided into three sections the Sierra tent range features a covered front porch ideal for outdoor relaxing or for covered cooking and dining. Inside is a spacious living area with plenty of room for shelter on wet and windy days. The 5-man Sierra tent has large queen-sized bedroom with dividing curtain and Vango's midnight bedroom inner tents. The darkened fabric is designed to reduce the early morning light and keep the interior cooler, the bedrooms ensure a better night’s rest on bright summer evenings and mornings. Handy internal storage pockets help keep essentials like phones and torches close at hand and room dividers also allow for added privacy. 

Designed for cool camping in mind, the Vango Sierra Air 500 has multiple mesh panels throughout the tent, including the bedroom area to keep you cool and comfortable during warmer camping holidays. Sentinel Fabric keeps pack size and weight low, while ensuring Vango quality and durability. The Airbeam structure is quick and easy to pitch and provides a rigid structure in adverse weather conditions giving you more time to relax and enjoy camping.

The Vango Sierra 500 is an excellent choice for weekend camping trips, offering a balance of comfort, convenience, and durability. Pitched in as little as 10 minutes so that you can make the most of your time camping.

Vango Sierra 500 Features:

  • Diamond Clear Windows: Maximise natural light
  • Sentinel Fabric: Strong and durable fabric with a small pack down size
  • Midnight Bedrooms: Reduce early morning light for a better sleep
  • Lantern Hanging Points: Conveniently positioned to hang lights
  • Inflatable Airbeam Structure: Quick pitch, rigid air structure
  • Large Mesh Door: Covered mesh vents throughout keep the tent cool and reduce condensation 

Vango Sierra Air tent Specification:

Maypole MP7410 Wireless Digital Reversing Camera

Wireless Digital Reversing Camera for your Caravan, Campervan or Motorhome

The Maypole MP7410 Wireless Digital Reversing Camera provides an easy-to-install, interference-free solution for safe reversing. Ideal for cars, vans, caravans, motorhomes, trailers, and horseboxes, it features a 25-meter wireless range between the camera and monitor. The system offers a large 4.3" colour LCD display, a 105° wide viewing angle, and 6 infrared LEDs for enhanced night vision. With its IP65 waterproof rating, it’s durable enough to withstand all weather conditions. The camera's high resolution of 640×480 pixels ensures clear visuals, while the monitor offers 480×272 pixels. It can be flush-mounted for rear installation or surface-mounted for internal views, making it versatile for various setups.

Key Features:

  • 25m wireless range and interference-free connection
  • 4.3" LCD display with 105° wide viewing angle
  • 6 infrared LEDs for night vision
  • IP65 waterproof camera for all-weather use0
  • Option for a second camera (MP7411) for internal view

Protect your caravan in style with the Maypole Universal Front Towing Cover, designed to provide superior protection against the elements. Crafted from premium, impact-resistant 3-layer material, this cover shields your caravan from stone chips, road grit, dirt, exhaust fumes, and bugs. The highly water-resistant, non-scratch fleece-lined interior ensures your caravan stays safe and secure. Easy to install with adjustable straps and buckles, the Maypole Towing Cover offers a perfect fit for most caravans with two front awning channels. The cover features road-legal lights visible through a PVC window and includes reflectors for maximum visibility both day and night. For added convenience, the cover comes with a handy storage bag.

Product Name: Vango Sunlight Air 2-in-1 Awning & Sun Canopy
Product Description:
Vango Sunlight Air 2-in-1 Awning & Sun Canopy

An Adaptable Awning for Caravan and Campervans

The Vango Sunlight Air Canopy Awning is a versatile 2-in-1 awning. The full enclosed awning can easily convert into a sun canopy by removing the the front door and side walls. When the walls and doors are in place, the clear windows have roll-away curtains for added privacy. With a Kador height of 180cm - 210cm, this awning is suitable for low height campervans and caravans. Its single AirBeam structure ensures quick and easy pitching with the included pump, while its durable 150D Sentinel Active fabric provides excellent weather protection. With multiple attachment options and a compact design, the Vango Sunlight Air is ideal for campers seeking a flexible outdoor space. Includes a removable internal groundsheet ideal for when the ground is wet.

Note: This awning IS NOT designed to be used as a Drive-Away Awning 

Vango Sunlight Air Awning Features

  • 150D fabric with an HH rating of 4,000MM.
  • ColourLok Eco technology to minimise colour fade from the sun.
  • Single beam structure ensures awning is quick and easy to assemble whilst ensuring a light and compact pack size.
  • Adjustable pegging points allows awning to be pitched perfectly on uneven surfaces.
  • Inflatable structure (includes pump).
  • Includes carry bag.

Awning & Sun Canopy Specification
